111312.content: You were born in a very dangerous world. Big female creatures hungered for people like you. The Titans, as they were called, suddenly appeared on earth and no one knew why. You only knew that the women and girls vanished as the Titans appeared. These big humanlike creatures wore diapers and were constantly looking for a man that they could eat. Many of People you knew already became food for the Titans. You somehow survived. You lived
111312.title: You

111331.content:
In the World of Remnant Mankind is besieged by the Creatures of Grimm, being who are attracted to negative emotions and kill any human or faunas they come across, for reasons unknown.

There are two groups who fight them.

The Huntsmen: Males who undergo training for years in specialized combat schools and utilize unique weaponry in accordance to their semblance and fighting style. These Hunters are generally placed in teams of four, and maintain close bonds with one another.

The other group are the Huntresses. Or more commonly, The Giantess'.

The Huntresses are, of course, females, and all females are Huntresses. But in Remnant women are the size of giants. Where a fully grown man is perhaps shorter then an Ursa or a Beowulf, a Huntress can swing either of these creatures around, as if they were toys.

There is another fact about the Huntresses. They often eat their male counterparts.

They do this because of two reasons. Firstly, a Huntress can gain a boost to thier Aura if they eat a man. How this was discovered, no one knows, but it has been proven as fact many times over. Secondly a Huntress can extend her lifespan by funneling the taken aura directly into thier physical bodies

When this was discovered women all across Remnant began to feed. However this diet caused later generations to have complete incontinence. Since they didn't want to simply soil everything where they lived, the Huntresses came up with a technique that affects every Huntress today and all that will come after them.

The Auric Diaper.

It is a diaper that upon birth, will form on a Huntress' body and grow with her for the rest of her life. This has caused the Giantesses to adopt a semi-infantile lifestyle, often in order to cope with the never ending Hunt of Grimm.

The Diapers themselves are able to be cleaned if the Huntress channels Aura through it for a time. However more often then not, a Huntsman will smell a Huntress coming before either see each other, this being a Huntsman's "early warning" tool.

With all these going for the Huntresses, the Men of the world are very outnumbered on both sides by both enemy and "ally".

This has caused the males of the world to build vast underground cities, where the Huntresses and many Grimm cannot find them. The only ones above ground are the Four Kingdoms, who are protected by walls large enough to deter both Huntress and Grimm if necessary.

The Huntresses see no problem with this, and use the opportunity to explore Remnant to their leisure and pleasure.

But there are times when the act of reproduction needs to come about.

Huntresses are capable of shrinking down to normal size, but only when they are about to have/are in the middle of intercourse, or pregnant with child.

Males will simply remain the size pf a normal person. Females will grow to enormous size over the course of five years and most simply leave behind the males to find company with other women.

The Huntresses by comparison live in the wild, with little to no common technology, in massive cave systems, rural plains, massive jungles, etc.

The Huntresses see no need for complicated weaponry, though there are a few who do. Many are content with using thier natural strength on the lesser Grimm, while augmenting themselves with Dust for the Elder Grimm, or groups of enemies.

They utilize Dust by either ingesting crystal or powder forms, or weaving Dust into the lining of thier Auric Diapers, usually a personal emblem of sorts.



When not hunting, some brave souls can witness a Huntress in a relaxed state. Huntress will often find beauty and wonder in the world around them, being overcome by immense curiosity and childlike behavior. One notable instance was when a Huntress was seen making a colossal sand castle on the coast of Anima.

Finally, while it is rare, some Huntresses bond with a Huntsman, and become partners. It is rare since a Giantess would rather eat a Huntsman than work with them.

But those who do bond with Huntsman become fiercely protective of them. Attacking a Huntress' male partner is to invite pain on the violator of this unwritten rule.




Who is the protagonist, who ventures into this world?
111331.title: RWBY

1113311.content: This begs the question. Are you a huntsman trying to help other people in remnant or a you a normal citizen? Or perhaps your role in this story is a completly diffrent one?

11133111.title: You are a huntsman

choices: You sneak out of the city
111331112.content:
You are a huntsman. A keeper of peace in the world of Remnant. Many years of training, learning and experience made you into who you were today. As a protector of the innocent you fought the creatures of grimm if they would come to close to your city. But the work was pretty boring if you were honest. Since your city was underground there were almost no attacks.

Of course thinking like that was a bit... Well.. Let's just say it wasn't very mature. But you couldn't help it. Since you were a little kid you always wanted to fight the grimm and it was like a wish came true as you got accepted to one of the huntsman academys. You will always remember the good times you had with your teammates. After you graduated everyone just went to a diffrent city and you got stuck here. You remember all to well what they said to you before they assigned you to this city:" Since you were such a capable leader we decided to let you guard this city on your own. " At first this seemed like a compliment but you found out soon enough that they just tried to put you in a city were nothing ever happens. Which was more than an insult in your oppinion.

The city was a nice place to live but you dreamed about something bigger. The kingdoms. You always wanted to go outside, see the sky and well... fight grimm. But you couldn't just leave this city unprotected. What if something happened and you weren't there? There was no one that could stop a big horde of grim. And the next huntsman academy was miles away. Sure there were some huntsman who occassionally passed the city on their journey to other cities and some of them even took some rest inside one of the Inn's but they would always leave the city the next day.

The thing was that the older and more experienced huntsman weren't assigned to a city anymore. They could just venture out into the world and experience many interesting things. If you weren't watching for possible grimm attacks you enjoyed to talk to the huntsman that entered the city. They always had some stories about the world that lied above you. These stories often involved a large number of grimm and occassionally... a huntress.

These giant women were also a reason as to why you wanted to see the overworld. You just couldn't imagine that a living being could get that tall. You had never seen one in your whole life and this just made you more curious. Sure they were dangerous. Your father had often told you that. He was actually outside there and met one of these giant women. Your mother. You had only ever heard about her. You father had always told you that she was the nicest person he had known despite that she wanted to eat him at first.

But both of them got along quite well after he showed her his "charme". You were never sure what he ment by that. "She was actually more of a baby than you when you were little. " Their bond seemed indestructable. But after your mother gave birth to you, something happened between the two and since then your father had to raise you on his own. But he never showed any sign of sadness about what had happened. It was just part of life in this world as he would always say with a big grin.

Someday you were sure to get out of this city. Either by sneaking out or by waiting. You just wanted to see the outside world.

Do you decide to be selfish just for a good adventure?
111331112.title: No it didn't

choices: Something big was blocking your sight
The earth began to shake under you.
1113311121.content:
You made your decision. This night you would leave the city. Sure, you put your own desires above the lives of alot of people but it's not like there are many grimm down here. They would manage to hold them off. Maybe they would think you got killed or something. That would certainly leave you with a better conscience. But it would probably make your dad really sad. The old man has been through enough.

In his youth he was a huntsman too, but from what you heard about him, he didn't have to protect a city on his own. He could always walk out into the wilderness to experience some adventures. Adventures that had cost him his right leg but atleast he didn't have a boring life like you. Sure in the past huntsman were a little diffrent. They could walk out the city far earlier but that also led to many deaths and injuries. That's why it was changed.

Everything the people of this world do is wait inside their safezones until they are dead. What's the point in all of this. You rather have an adventurous short life then a boring long life. These thoughts flew through your head as you packed your things into a backpack. The last thing you put into your backpack was your spear Crystal. It was a spear with a sharp rock on the front and a crystal at the back. Yeah you were never really good with names. This spear could use the crystal at it's back to fire energy beams. You could either use it to fire at your enemies or use the recoil to power your attacks with the sharp rock up. It could be refilled easily by opening the crystal and putting some dust into it.

Crystal had however a tendency to malfunction from time to time. The weapon wasn't very new. All over the weapon were little cuts. Your grandfather had built it when he was young and then it was handed down to you. You made some additions to the original weapon and renamed it. All in all it was useful most of the time. After everything was put into your backpack you went to the frontdoor of your house. The good thing was that you could just walk out the door without thinking about your father noticing that you would leave the city. It was like every night when you had to leave the house to go on duty.

You closed the door and went off to the wall that protected the city from the outside world. Everyone was asleep. They wouldn't notice a thing. You walked outside the wall. The crystals that were hanging from the walls glowed bright enough for you to see the way in front of you. You knew that if you would follow this way you would get out of this cave. After what seemed like an hour you finally saw light in the distance. This had to be the exit. You ran up to the light and found the end of a road that lead out. This road was probably built to connect your city with one of the kingdoms but it was never completed. You could imagine why.

A big footprint was in the middle of the road. It was likely that a huntress had showed up and the workers didn't react fast enough. The moon was shining down on you and it was the first time you ever saw it with your own eyes. You only ever saw it in books and you always wondered why and how it got torn apart. But you never got an answer. You didn't want to follow the road because that would lead you to civilization. You wanted to see what adventures would await you in the wilderness. And in order to do that you left the road and went into a nearby forest.

Seeing that it would be better to rest a bit while it was still night you layed down your backpack, sat down on the ground and closed your eyes. The next day...
1113311121.title: You sneak out of the city

choices: She had white hair in a side-ponytail (Weiss)
11133111211.content:
As you woke up the next day you noticed something was off. Sleep addled as you were it took a few minutes for you realize something.

When you woke up fully, you saw what was so off about your situation, and what you saw made you freeze up in both terror and pure survival instinct.

Not thirty feet away from your resting place was a massive diaper.

You externally remained calm but on the inside you were freaking out. Not only had a huntress gotten near you in your sleep, but it looked like you were extremely lucky enough to not get crushed under her massive, poofy rear. Had she taken one more step in your direction, you never would have woken up today.

You did your damnedest to keep quiet and not move, you had no idea if this huntress was awake or not, and if she was, then the less noise you made, the better.

Suddenly, the diaper in your field of vision rotated so it was now vertical. You mentally cursed, it looked like she'd been either laying down or asleep, but she sure wasn't now.

Before you could think anything else, you began to hear grunts, specifically from somewhere above you. You wanted to see who exactly was sitting above you, but there were more pressing matters. Like the EXPANDING DIAPER IN FRONT OF YOU!

Your luck held out again, as the Huntress seemed too preoccupied with pooping her diaper to notice you scrambling backwards away from the "blast radius" as it were. You quietly panted as you looked back at your would-be crusher and saw the padding had expanded a good distance in the back and was now lumpy. With a final grunt of exertion, the messy padding finished expanding to twice it's original size and the Huntress let out a sigh or relief.

At this point you took the moment get a good look through the treetops at who had nearly killed you with a dirty diaper.

You looked up and saw......
11133111211.title: Something big was blocking your sight

choices: No you can have him (Weiss eats you)
11133111212.content:
You woke up to notice the earth shaking. Or was that even the earth? Something under you began to move. You looked down and noticed that what you were sleeping on wasn't the ground it was something much more dangerous. A loud sigh confirmed your fear. You looked around and noticed a giant face behind two fleshy mounds right in front of you. You were standing on top of a huntress.

She hadn't notice you yet which is why you decided to take a closer look at her. It was the first huntress you had ever seen. Her dark necklong hair ended in red tips. She didn't look that old. Maybe 15 or 16 years old. Far younger than you but she was still much more tall. She was completly naked except for her diaper and her cape. It would be best to not disturb her in any way. Otherwise you might end as her morning snack.

As you tried to move a booming sound could be heard and her body began to shake under you. Were you really... You tried to walk again. Again the same thing happened. She was ticklish. Which was on the one hand cute but on the other extremely damgerous. How are you able to walk off of her without tickling her and what if she... SEES YOU! She looked directly at you. You could see the curiousity in her silver eyes. Seconds pass. With either one of you looking into the eyes of the other one. Then, suddenly she grabs you. You try squirm but you were no match for her grip.

The girl lifted you up to her face and looked at with shimmering eyes. Why did they never taught you how to get out of a situation like this at huntsman school. Looking at her she seemed equivally as interested in you as you were interested in her. Atleast she wasn't hungry. Maybe you should apologize? "Look I-I'm sorry for s-sleeping on top of you. I-I didn't know that it was you. P-Please don't eat me. This is my f-first day outside the city. "

The girl smiled. Your attempt at an apology seemed to amuse her. Then she opened her mouth and shouted:" Yang! Yang! Look at what I found. " A blonde haired girl stood up a bit further away in the forest. She was taller than the girl that was holding you. "What is it this time Ruby. I hope it's not one of these nevermore grimm again. They always try to mess up my hair by landing in it. ":said Yang.

"Look. Look. ":Ruby showed you to Yang. Yang looked at you with big eyes :"Oh just what I needed. A snack." You shuddered at that. "No no. Look. He can talk.":Ruby said. You were a bit confused at that statement:" Umm.." "Yeah. All of them can do that. ":Yang said. Ruby was surprised:" You mean they could all do that? That's strange. Then why did they never talk to me before?" "Maybe they were scared? And remember you don't really give them time to do that. You swallow them without hesitation. ":Yang answered.

Ruby was shocked :"You mean those things were living beings with emotions and the ability to think?" "Well some of them are quite dumb regardless of these attributes but yes they were living beings. Doesn't make them less tasty. ":Yang answered. "That's horrible Yang. I'm a murderer. ":Ruby said as tears began to form in her eyes. Did she really not know this? Yang tried to comfort her:"Ruby. It's completly normal for us to eat them. They make us stronger and if we don't do it they might attack us. " That didn't seem to help however as Ruby's tears that were as big as a horse hit the ground.

Again something in the forest began to move as too other huntresses woke up. The one of them had white hair that was put into a offside bun tail and the other one black hair with cat ears. A faunus. Both of them walked over to Ruby and Yang. "What is it this time? ":The white haired girl said. "Ruby just found out that her food is a living being with emotions Weiss. ":Yang answered. Weiss only gave Ruby a look of confusion. Glad to see that you are not the only one thinking that was weird.

The faunus girl began to speak:" And that's reason you had to wake us up? Last time when you squished this pony it was understandable. But this? " Ruby said under tears:"Blake we are killers. " Blake ignored what she said and turned to Yang:" Why does your sister always cry about such insignificant stuff? " "Look she is a bit younger and more pure than us. There are some things she just hasn't learned yet. ":Yang tried to reason with Blake. "But it's your job as her sister to teach her those things. Otherwise she will always burst out into tears if something new happens to her. ":Blake said.

As the two girls discussed the situation Weiss slowly came up to Ruby. "So are you going to eat him or what? I'm quite hungry myself. ":Weiss asked. Sobbing Ruby replied:"
11133111212.title: The earth began to shake under you.

111331112123.content:
"No Weiss. I will protect him. I will make sure that nobody ever causes harm to him in any way. ":Ruby said. Her eyes were still filled with tears. Weiss looked annoyed:"Uhh.. fine. I see if I'll find something else. " And with that she left. Ruby wanted to gain some distance between herself and the still arguing Blake and Yang. So she walked off to a little lake. Well for her it was merely a puddle. She put her feet into the water and looked at you.

This all was quite alot to take in. You had just witnessed a huntress change her opinion about eating huntsman. She even claimed to protect you. But that still didn't make her less dangerous. She could still crush you by accident. And what if the other girls came back? They didn't seem like they would hesitate to eat you. She seemed to notice your worries. "Don't worry. They won't get you as long as I'm around to protect you. "

"Excuse me this is a bit much. ":you took a long breath:"I just woke up, then I had the fear to be eaten by you, then four of you debate if you eat me or not and now I am under your protection. That's the craziest morning in my entire life. " Ruby was completly stunned by your ability to talk. Just because she had never seen that before. Like a little kid that had got a new toy. You saw how interested she was in what you had to say. This was actually kinda a good feeling. Normally you were the one listening to others but now you had someone that treated you like you were something special.

Maybe letting her protect you wasn't that bad. "How about we introduce ourselves properly if you want to protect me? I'm (name) and I came from an underground city to see what remnant looks like overground. " Ruby had these shimmering eyes again:" You came from underground. Oh that's so cool. I never met someone from underground. Well I never asked the guys I found. I... uhhh..." she paused for a bit. "Oh well I'm Ruby. Nice to meet you. ": she held one of her fingers in front of you. You only touched it with your hand and you both did your best at shaking hands. Well Ruby was mostly shaking you.

It didn't take long for Ruby to bombard you with questions again. She wanted to know everything about you, your life and why you decided to go to the overworld. While you told her your story there was the occassional "cool" or "aww". Ruby was a really good listener. So much so that you talked for 2 hours without stopping. You didn't even notice it. You were too invested in telling your story:" And there I was 5 beowolfs in front of me, two ursa behind me. I took Crystal and managed to take down two of the beowolfs by using the knockback of the lightbeam to propel myself forward. The other three were kicked away because I shot them with the lightbeam. The only thing in my way were the two ursa. And so I.. "

"What did you do? What did you do? ": Ruby asked excited. "I... ":you started. "Yes? Yes?": Ruby looked at you again with this shimmering eyes. "I ran. ":You answered. "You... ran? ":Ruby sounded confused. "Yeah I knew there was no way I would take them down with crystal. This weapon would always malfunction when I needed it the most. So I did the most logical thing that came to my mind. Which was running away. ": You explained. To your surprise Ruby exclaimed excited:" Oh my god. That's so cool. I never ran away from a grimm. I mostly squish them beneath my feet. They always make these funny squishy noises. "

Ruby had this unnatural behaviour that made you instantly like her. She seemed so innocent, childish and all in all fun loving that you couldn't help yourself but to find her cute. And to be cute at this size was quite difficult. "Ruby. I was wondering. How do you get along with these other huntresses. They don't seem to like your decisions. ":you asked. "Well you know how it is. They are my team and they are just a bit worried about me. My big sister Yang cares alot about me. And sometimes I just do what I want to do. But I know they like me regardless of my decisions. Otherwise they would have just abandoned me. ":Ruby answered.

"Yeah teams can be a bit troubling if you want to do some stuff on your own. I had this alot as I was in a team. It may be one for all and all for one but sometimes you just have to do what you want. Regardless if they like it or not.":You said. Ruby gave you a smile. The rest of the day you and Ruby talked about all sorts of stuff. She learned alot about huntsman culture while you learned alot about huntress culture. As the sun began to vanish Ruby went back to the other girls. She assured you that they wouldn't harm you in any way. She would protect you if anything bad happens.

There was a little debate about why Ruby was still having you with her but the giantesses soon were too tired to continue their conversation. Before Ruby went to sleep she suggested:" You know they might eat you if you sleep out here. Maybe you want to sleep in my diaper. Yeah I know it's a bit disgusting but it would atleast hold them off from eating you. "
111331112123.title: No I will protect him

1113311121232.content:
You thought about Ruby's plan. What if she moved in her sleep? Where could you even position yourself to not get squished? And what if she... used it? "Ruby I think it's equally dangerous in there as out here. ":You said. "What? No you'll be fine. I mean were you ever in a diaper before? ":she asked. You could only give a "No. " as answer. "See? How can you know that it's dangerous if you weren't even in one? ":Ruby said as if it were completly logical. "There are numerous things wrong with this Ruby. And I do not care to list them all up to you. You should know that.":you said.

"Silly (name). How am I supposed to know that? I was never inside a diaper before. So,how about we give it a try? ":she said. You grew a bit irritated at her beheaviour. Calling you silly for stating the obvious? Sure she could be cute with her childish attitude but that was going to far. "Sure why not. Worst thing that could happen is that I die. ":you said in a sarcastic tone. "Great. I was wondering when you would get it. ":she said not getting your sarcasm. She grabbed you off the ground and proceeded to shove you into the front of her diaper.

"No Ruby this isn't what I meant. I was being sarcastic. ":you shouted but it was already too late. She just shoved you in there. It was dark, wet and very warm. The strong scent of pee was all over the place. Atleast she hadn't yet used her diaper for "something else ". "Are you comfy in there? ":she asked. "As comfy as a peed diaper can get. ":you answered. "Oh excuse me.. just.. uh.. wait a moment. "she said as you saw the outline of her hand touching the back of her diaper.

"What are you doing? ":you asked. "Cleaning. You know I actually didn't expect any visitors. ":she answered as you felt the diaper get clean again. It was actually very soft and it would probably make a good bed. But there was still the fear of being squished. "Better now?":she asked. "A bit. Do you have some music in here? ":you joked. "Oh no I forgot the music. How can you get comfortable down there if you have no music?":Ruby was shocked. "Ruby. That was a joke. ":you explain. "Oh. He... music diapers. I bet Weiss would constantly hear classic on hers if she had one. ":You could hear Ruby laughing about that thought.

Walking around in Ruby's diaper was a bit difficult. Every time you took a step your feet sank down into the soft material. It was also quite cramped in here. You could only walk a few steps before either colliding with a padded wall or... the thing. You've had heard of it in the huntsman academy but you had never seen it with your own eyes. A vagina. It looked like a very weird mouth. Something drove you closer to it. You knew what it's purpose was. This was the same thing you came from. You wondered. Does Ruby have children or plan to get some? No she couldn't have. She is too young. You just had to ask:" Ruby did you ever push a baby out of there? " You touched her vagina.

"A baby? Why should I do that? I pee from there. How is that even possible? " You could tell by the way she reacted that she had no clue about reproduction. Should you even tell her about it? Wouldn't that worry her even more then now. She obviously didn't know that you were one and the same species. C'mon she deserves to know. You just had to tell. "Ruby. Every huntress. No female, has the ability to form a child inside their body. And if that child grows big enough it get's pushed out of there. Everyone you know got pushed out of a vagina when they were born. You, me... " "Even Weiss? ":Ruby interrupted you. "Yes Weiss too. ":You answered her question.

"But if that is true why didn't I have a child until now? ":Ruby asked. "Well Ruby. That's because it takes a male to form that child. The male sticks his thing. The penis inside the vagina and then they do something that's called sex. And after that is done you get a baby after nine months if everthing goes right. ":you felt uncomfortable telling her that. It just sounded awkward coming out of your mouth. But atleast Ruby took this information quite well. "That's weird. But it explains alot. So does this mean I have a dad too? ":she asked. "Probably. Didn't you ever see him?":You asked her back. "No. I only ever saw my mum. She never told me about him. I bet he was very big. ":Ruby answered.

So she didn't understand what you were telling her. "Ruby I don't think he was or is. If he is still around there. You know actually your dad was probably as small as I am. ":you explained. Ruby was now completly confused:"WHAT!?! HOW IS THAT EVEN POSSIBLE? I MEAN THEY ARE SO SMALL AND WE'RE SO BIG. AND OH MY GOD WE ARE EATING OUR OWN SPECIES? " "Well yeah. And you don't seem to know that apperently. ":you answer her calmly. "I have so many questions and my head hurts. So does this mean your mother was one of us too?":she asked.

"Yes. I hope she still is. I never saw her. As soon as I was born she left us. ":you answered: "Do you know why she would do that? I mean I'm not a huntress. Maybe you have a clue. " "No. I don't know." "And what happened to your mother? ":you asked. "She died when I was very young. I don't really remember anything about it. ":Ruby said completly calm. "I'm sorry. ":you apologised. "It's ok you didn't know. " Both of you were silent. You took a moment to think about what you just did. With one simple explanation you changed the whole world of a girl.

"(Name)?Can you promise me to not do that sex thing to me? ":Ruby asked. "Ruby! We only know each other for one day. And besides you are a bit young to become a mother. Oh and in order to do that you have to shrink yourself down. ":You explained. "Shrink myself down? How am I gonna do that? ":she asked. "I don't know. I only heard that you have to in order for this to work. ":you answered. Ruby yawned:"All this talk has made me tired. Sleep well. I see you tomorrow. " "Good night. ":you said.

It didn't take long for Ruby to fall asleep. You had trouble however. Thoughts about what you just did ran through your head. It was also a bit unusual to sleep inside a huntress diaper. It felt weird. As you were laying on the soft material you could hear someone talk. "So if this guy came here there has to be a city nearby. " "I found a street going underground. Maybe that's where he came from. " "Yeah let's search there tomorrow. "

So Weiss, Blake and Yang were planning to attack your city. You had to do something. You tried to climb out of Ruby's diaper but you couldn't. You were trapped until she woke up. But you had to do something now otherwise everyone will die. You could do nothing else than wait. While Ruby was asleep she
1113311121232.title: You sleep in Ruby's diaper

choices: You wake up just in time
11133111212323.content:
Ruby was completly still. You would have expected her to roll around alot. But somehow she didn't. It was as if she was awake and trying her best to stop herself from rolling around. You couldn't find any sleep however. The girls would try to attack your city and you weren't there to protect it. Everyone would die and here you were sitting around in the diaper of a 15 year old huntress. You tried everything from tickling her to shouting her name. Ruby didn't react. The only thing that happened was that Ruby mumbled something in her sleep:"No Weiss I don't want to hear your music diaper. Ha music diaper. " She seemed to dream about one of your previous conversations.

Great now you were sitting here and couldn't do anything but wait. You couldn't sleep. All the thoughts about tomorrow let you stay awake. Weiss, Blake and Yang would start their attack then. And what would you even do about them attacking your city? They would just eat you if you would stand in their way. You were merely a small snack in their eyes. Insignificant. You could only imagine how they would hold you over their heads and fight about who gets to eat you. Before they would let you fall down into one of their mouths, only to be gulped down to land in a stomach full of acid. In there you would be broken down and everything that would remain of you would be shat into one of their diapers.

The thought of that was depressing but you knew that if you wouldn't stop them from attacking, the same thing would happen to the people in the city. To your father... You couldn't let that happen. You couldn't believe that all of this happened just because you wanted an adventure. Now you got one and in exchange you will take so many innocent lifes. You had to stop the girls somehow. Ruby could help but would she do it? Would she try to hold them off? But she was still only one huntress against three. She wouldn't stand a chance. The only way you could rescue the city is by being there before the huntresses. You could warn everyone before they would show up. But how would the inhabitans even react if they would see you? You left them alone to do something you wanted. Would they even listen to you?

You head began to hurt. You heard the same sentence repeat itself over and over again. "You did that. You did that. You did that. You did that." It drove you crazy. You tried to hit yourself to make it stop. But it didn't. "No don't take them. They are innocent. ":You heard yourself say out loud. "Take me I deserve it. " You talked to someone who wasn't even there. Were you going insane? No. Stay focused. You had to see your goal in front of you. Tomorrow. Go.. to..the.. city... warn... them. Your head never hurt this much in your entire life. It was hard to even think. You had to sleep. You just had to sleep. If not, you would be to tired to even go back. After what seemed like ages you finally closed your eyes and fell asleep immediately.

The next morning...
11133111212323.title: Stayed still

111331112123232.content:
You woke up to see that you were still laying in Ruby's diaper. But something was diffrent. She... moved. With every step she took the diaper pressed you against her private parts. Didn't she notice that you were still in here? "Ruby. Get me out of here. ":You shouted. Ruby stopped. You finally saw light entering your absorbent prison as her hand reached down to get you. Grabbing you, she lifted you up to her face. "I almost forgot you were in there. I'm sorry about that. "

Looking at her you got the feeling you forgot something. What was it? Had it something to do with Ruby? "I'm gonna look for something to eat. ":Ruby said as she placed you on her shoulder and walked away from the others. That's it. It had something to do with eating. Ruby hummed while she strolled through the forest. The trees were merely bushes to her at best.

"You know, I don't really know what I should eat now that I won't eat human flesh anymore. Do you think these vines taste good? ":Ruby asked you as she picked some vines from a tree. "I don't... ":you began. But Ruby had already put the vines into her mouth. It looked like she was eating green noodles. "Mmhh": she slurped the vines up. "...think that is very tasty. ":you ended. But Ruby seemed to like it. Atleast she didn't eat humans anymore.

Wait this was it. The girls wanted to eat humans and they wanted to attack your... "Ruby. Ruby. We have to go. Your friends will attack my city. We have to stop them. ":you shouted. "These vines taste great. ":she said, not fully listening to you. "Ruby. They are going to kill my dad. We have to do something." Ruby looked at you on her shoulder:"What did he do to them? " It was hard for you to not loose your patience right now. "He didn't do anything to them. They want to attack my city to eat all the people that live there. I heard them talk while you were asleep. If we are fast enough we can warn the city. "

"But I don't know where you live. ":Ruby said. "It's ok Ruby. I know where I live. You can help me get there faster. Just find an abandoned road with a footprint in the middle of it, that leads into a cave. ":you said. With that Ruby looked for the location you told her about. It wasn't actually that far away from you. The cave was just big enough for Ruby to fit in. You gave her instructions on which way she should follow to get to your city. As you reached it...
111331112123232.title: You wake up just in time

1113311121232322.content:
Good. You had still time to warn everyone. "Ruby try to get their attention. This should be easy for you. ":you said. Ruby nodded. She walked to the wall and looked into the city. Immediately the people inside began to scream, hid in their houses or tried to run away. "Tell them that they should run away from here as fast as possible.":you said. "Citizens of... Uh... Sorry I don't know the name of your city. Anyway I wanted to warn you about three huntresses heading to your city. They are searching for a snack. ":Ruby tried to convince them.

Some of the people actually responded:" Why should we trust you? You are one of them. You just want to get us out of our save walls so that you can eat us. We don't even have our huntsman anymore. " Ruby grabbed you from her shoulder and showed you to them :"You mean this huntsman? I found him on the overworld. He changed the way I think about you people and taught me alot. He is the reason I came down here. He wanted that I warn you. "

"It's true what she says. And please leave this place if you want to live. These three huntresses aren't that far away anymore. Please. Get to the next City. Ruby and I will hold them off.":you shouted. Some of them listened and walked out of the city into the direction of the next one. But there were still some skeptic one's:"What if she is manipulating him? We didn't see him for nearly two days. She could have easily lied to us. "

"Trust me. She isn't lying. I beg you to leave this place. Otherwise they will kill you. ":you shouted. You couldn't force them, they had to believe you. Again some of them left the city but a small group stayed behind:"We won't leave. We don't believe you. " Why? Why wouldn't they just listen to you? "Fine. Have it your way. But I assure you this will end with your death!":you shouted. But you knew one person that would surely believe you. Your dad. You had to get him out of this city. "Ruby could you please let me down? I need to find my father and get him out of here."

Ruby put you down behind the wall:" I will stand guard and alarm you when they come. " You ran as fast as you could back to your home. As you reached the door you nearly broke it as you hammered against it :"Dad. Dad. Are you in there? You have to leave. " Why didn't he open the door? You should have taken your key with you back when you left this place. But you thought you wouldn't get back here. After 5 minutes he finally opened the door."(Name) I thought you were dead. Where were you? You have to tell me everything. ":He said as he tried to hug you.

"There is no time for that. You have to leave. Three Huntresses will attack this city. One huntress that is part of their group helped me to get here and I convinced most of the citizens to run. Maybe you can catch up to them if you are lucky. Everything is better than to stay here. ":You said. You knew it would be a bit hard for him with only one leg but he could do it. He placed a hand on your shoulder :"I'm just happy to see that you are still alive. Let's hope we will meet in the next city. "

"I will find you. ":you said. You said goodbye to each other and you saw him limp to the next city. Now there was only one thing to do. Get back to Ruby. You ran back to the wall and she was still standing there guarding the city. Some of the people that stayed inside the walls mocked her. Why? She was betraying her own kind just to help them and this is how they thank her? Ruby didn't listen however. She was looking into the direction the other girls would come from.

You climbed up the wall to get to Ruby but then it happened. "Them are here. Everyone hide. ":Ruby said. You could see the three girls in the distance. They looked surprised as they saw Ruby. "Oh there you are Ruby. We thought we lost you. Are you here to eat them too? ":Yang asked. "No. I won't let you do this. These people are innocent. ":Ruby said. "I told you that your sister would do this Yang. Why didn't you listen to me? ":Blake said. Yang looked to Ruby and then back to Blake:" Maybe we just have to convince her that these little guys taste great. Let's get behind that wall and feed them to her. " The girls came closer. "I warn you if you come one step closer I will be forced to attack you. ":Ruby said. The huntresses..

But, classes start back up tomorrow! Which is why I've taken the time to schedule a series of wonderful events for us today."

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
You were walking around in a field of flowers which seemed endless. Everything around you looked the same. You walked for what seemed like an eternity before you saw someone in the distance. You tried to walk up to the person but you didn't seem to get any closer. As you stopped the person got even further away. Who was this person? What were you doing here? All of these questions flew through your mind as suddenly the sky turned red and everywhere around you lightning bolts shot to the earth.

You felt a sharp pain on your face. Were you struck by the lightning? No this couldn't be the case. The lightning was only striking the ground around you and not you. The pain returned as a voice got louder and louder. You couldn't quiet understand it the first time but slowly it got more clear. "Wake up. " The pain was now intense as you looked up to the sky. You were certain the voice was coming from this direction. Then the lightning struck you right in the face.

You woke up and immediately had to fill your lungs with alot of air. You felt like you ran for ages "Finally. I thought you would never wake up. ":Weiss said. Then you felt the pain again. "Uhh why does my face hurt so much? ":You asked her. "Maybe because I had to wake you up somehow. Luckily I had something that helped me with that. ":She said and you saw that she was holding a collar in her hand. "Oh I almost forgot why I even had that with me. This is a present for you. You can thank me later. "

She handed you the collar."Property of Weiss Schnee" was written on the front. "What are you waiting for? Wear it. Everyone should see that you are proud to be mine. " Knowing that Weiss wouldn't stop trying to get you to wear it, you put it around your neck. "Oh you look wonderful. I can't wait to show you of to Ruby. " Weiss was acting like you were some dog she was really proud about. As she went on about how broken Ruby will be when she shows you to her, you noticed that she was still in her messy diaper. "Don't you want me to change your diaper first? ":You asked.

Weiss looked down and noticed her messed diaper. "Oh you are such a caring person. I would love it if you would do that. " Weiss was acting strange. Why was she complementing you all of the sudden. Was it because of this collar? You thought for a bit. This collar was symbolising that you were hers. Maybe she always wanted to have a relationship with someone but nobody really loved her. So she made you say what she wanted to hear. And do the things she wanted someone to do for her. This would explain why she was so nice as you offered to change her. She didn't have to give you an order to do it. She probably felt like you care for her.

You were reminded of the situation with Yang again. She didn't try to show off to the world how much you were hers. Weiss did however. Weiss wanted everyone to see that she managed to get someone to love her. Of course she was to arrogant to tell you that she likes you normally. She had to force you. She already stated that the others were getting soft and weak for liking a boy but in truth she was doing the same thing. As she said before she would tell everyone that you came to her willingly. You became her servant because you wanted this. No one would think that she was a hypocrite for liking you.

While you thought about all of this, Weiss was wriggling around happily between your arms as you changed her. She was liking every second of this. As you looked down on her you almost felt sorry for her. She probably had a rough childhood with everything she's been through. She had told you earlier that the white fang was attacking her family. In between all this chaos there was probably no time for her to actually meet someone she could love.

Taping her new diaper shut you lend her a hand and pulled her up. You noticed that she got a bit red on her cheeks. Yeah she was really liking you. She is just to arrogant to admit it. You liked her better this way but you were sure she would revert back to her other self once someone else would see you. Then she would be rude again and hurt you.

But you couldn't stand around here forever. You then noticed how Weiss was staring at the collar she gave you. Her eyes were big and a small smile formed on her face. Why did she have to be this adorable when no one is seeing it. You had the strange desire to pat her head. You didn't know how she would react however. She could very well prefer it if she would do this to you. Patting someones head had a parallel to pat an animal. And she already gave you a collar. Maybe she also wanted you to be her pet. You didn't know exactly but the desire to pat her head didn't vanish. So you decided to...

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
Little tears began to form in Weiss's eyes. You first thought that you upset her and you put your hand away. But then Weiss looked into your eyes hopefully. She wanted it. She needed it. This patting was the best thing she ever felt. So you put your hand back down on her head and began to pat her again. You felt how she actually pushed her head back to your hand. You felt her desire and you went on patting her. The tears in her eyes began to fall to the ground. One after another.

It was like all the years of pain were washed off of her body with a simple motion. The tears were soon replaced with a smile. Weiss felt relaxed and free. During all of this you didn't speak a word. You didn't have to. You could see everything Weiss wanted to tell you in her eyes. You could feel her body getting calm. During all this time she didn't break eye contact with you. She was completly focused on you. The desire to pet her was replaced with the desire to hug her.

This time you didn't think about it. You directly pulled her into a hug. You could feel her heartbeat getting faster. First she was a bit shocked but she slowly put her hands around you to hug you back. You felt her could body getting warmer by the second. The icequeen was practically melting in your arms. Her head rested on your shoulder as more tears left her eyes and went down your back. This time it weren't tears of sadness. It were tears of joy.

To think that this person would threaten to eat you was almost illogical. You didn't saw the bratty rich girl anymore. You saw the sad poor girl she really was. All the money she had couldn't buy her real love. Someone that took care of her. She needed you, you felt that now. But you couldn't just leave Ruby. While you were still thinking Weiss began to speak :"I'm sorry. I'm sorry that I made you responsible for my own inability to catch my meal. I'm sorry that I just use you to fill my desire to be loved. I'm sorry that I took you away from the girl you love. I'm just so sorry. "

You didn't look at her you only hugged her a bit stronger. "No I don't deserve this. I was being selfish and I should not be rewarded for that. You should leave me. Go back to Ruby. " You didn't go back. "How? How can you still be here hugging me? I'm a horrible person. " :Weiss said as more tears rolled down your back. "No. ":You said. "What? ":Weiss asked. "I said no. You are not a horrible person. You just need someone understands you. Someone who listens to what you have to say. If you would be a bit more honest about your feelings instead of hiding them behind your pride you would surely find love. I noticed how adorable you could be. ":You said as Weiss's cheeks reddened again.

You losened the hug and looked to her face :"How can someone like you not be in an relationship already. You are cute enough to melt everyone's heart. They should stop calling you icequeen. If you would act a bit more relaxed like now everyone would get the hots for you. I'm sure of it. " Weiss smiled again. Your motivational speech really impressed her.

"Now that we got that out of the way I will go back to Ruby. Ask me if you want me to do anything for you... And I will continue to wear this collar":You say. "You don't have to... ":Weiss says. "But I will. In honor of you. ":You say. "Anyway.see you around. ":You turn around to leave the room. But you could already feel that Weiss would be sad about this...

It's purpose wasn't to honour the memory of the dead. Once Neo would fill you in there she would never waste a thought with you again. You would just be an ordinary poop to her. A piece of shit that wasn't worth her time. Your only purpose was to feed yourself to her.

You weren't ready to make that decision. Not with everything that was on stake here right now. You couldn't just fade away into nothingness and let all the people who cared about you alone. You couldn't just walk out there and end it. You had something to lose.

But you couldn't stay in here forever. You had to get out of here. And as time went on your desire to end it grew more and more. Neo was still sitting there calmly in front of the pile of plushys you were hiding in. You had to make a decision.
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: You try to run

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
You made your decision. You would stay exactly where you were. If Neo wanted the satisfaction that you would willingly give yourself to her, you wouldn't allow it. And so you waited.

10 minutes passed. Neo was still sitting on the same spot looking at you. She had not once moved her eyes away from your hiding spot. It was starting to get hot under all the plushies.

An hour passed. She was still sitting there waiting. Wasn't she hungry? Was it really that important to her that you would come out willingly. Just for her to humiliate you one last time.

Another hour passed. Sweat ran down your forehead. It was now extremely hot inside the pile of plushies. You looked outside to see Neo still sitting there. She was determined to get you her way.

When would it end? Was there really only one way out of this situation? Giving up? There had to be another way. Somehow. Someway. You tried to find it but you couldn't. Looking back outside something was diffrent.

Neo wasn't sitting in front of the pile anymore. Had she given up? Did you win? You couldn't even answer these questions as a hand came through the plushies and grabbed you. You were pulled out of the pile and looked into the face of Neo who looked back at you smiling.

Did she grew impatient? Wasn't her plan to let you come out of your hiding spot willingly? Neo licked your face and then opened her mouth just wide enough that your head would fit in it. She slowly moved you into the direction of her mouth all the while giving you this complete neutral expression.

This was it. The end. You couldn't even do something about it. Just another snack for a crazy diapered girl. But before you head even touched her mouth she let go of you, letting you fall to the ground. Your whole body was still shaking because you expected it would beim over now. What was Neo doing?

Did she have a change of heart? No. This would make no sense. Was this another one of her tricks to demoralize you? This seemed much more logical. But why exactly would she try to eat you only to not do it? Was it because she thought your spirit was still too strong at the moment for you to voluntarily let her eat you? Maybe.

Neo meanwhile stood up. She was still hungry and held her hand over her stomach. You looked up to her. Something she didn't seem to like right now. Neo then kicked you in the face with her foot. The sudden kick gave you a nosebleed again. You felt the red liquid running down over your mouth and falling to the floor.

Putting her foot on top of your head, you knew what Neo was up to next. She pushed you down into the slowly growing puddle underneath your head. The liquid touched your face and you felt the familiar iron like taste on your tongue. To make sure you would stay where you were, she placed her padded bum on the back of your head. Only pushing you deeper into the puddle.

You were thankful that your nosebleed stopped not many minutes later. Otherwise it would be pretty hard to breath without getting the liquid inside your mouth. Your nose had been completly shut by this point. Since the blood was in the way you could only breath through your mouth. And even then you had to inhale the liquid.

Neu made herself comfortable and every now and then she bob up and down to make your experience even worse. After a few minutes she finally let you free. You immediately had inhale as much air as possible. Then, without hesitation, Neo sat down beside your puddle of blood and licked it all up. Every single bit.

As she looked up again some of your blood was still all around her mouth. Neo didn't mind. She looked horrifying and that's what she wanted to achieve. She wanted to show you how far she would go to scare you. She wanted to torture you in any possible way. You could always quit. You could end the torture right here. Just... give up. It's as simple as that.

But you were still clinging to hope. Hope that one day your friends would rescue you. They had to. Never would they ever forget you here. They were probably just on the way here. No... How could they even know where you were? They only knew that this base was in the southeast. But even knowing that, the chances were low that they would find you.

"Are you thinking about something?":Torchwick asked you through the speaker. "No, No, No. Don't say it. I knew what you are thinking about. You are thinking about little red and her friends. " You looked at the speaker surprised :"How did you? " "Just a lucky guess. I personally don't think they will get here anytime soon. And even if they do, we will have already left this place. That's right. Tomorrow we all will be sitting in a train back to Vale. Yeah we will bring you back home. And trust me this train ride will be explosivly good. Well have fun with Neo for the rest of the day. See you tomorrow. If you are still alive that is. "

Neo looked at you sadistically. She could only torture you till tomorrow. And you bet your heart she would do it. This will be one hell of a night.
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: Stay in the pile

choices: You knock Neo away from you
You don't do anything. Neo eats you
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
You weren't wrong. The whole night Neo tried to torture you in the most brutal way. You never even had the chance to sleep. To top it all of Neo tried to pleasure herself constantly by pushing your head against the front of her diaper with her feet. The look of lust never left her eyes. If this was the last day inside this room she would try to enjoy it.

As the next day finally started you were exhausted. How could Neo still be this energetic. You barely had any energy left and she was playing in the room as if nothing happened. Not a sign of tiredness in her eyes. "Ready for the ride? I don't have to hear a yes. Neo, make sure that he gets into the train. ":You heard Torchwick say before Neo jumped on top of you and started to violently hit you. The tiredness combined with Neo's hits made it all to easy for you to collapse.

As you opened your eyes again you were sitting on the ground. Still naked. You didn't try to move. They had handcuffed you again. You saw Neo on the other side of the room sitting on a box and smiling at you. She wasn't half naked anymore. She was wearing her clothes again. The outline of her diaper was clearly visible through her pants.

You could feel the room shake a bit as the train started it's engines. It was a bit cold sitting inside this room since it was completly made of metal. And on top of that you were naked. They didn't care to give you back your clothes. Then out of nowhere a big explosion could be heard. You looked into the direction where the sound came from. But a wall blocked your sight.

The next explosion followed. This time it was louder. Neo showed not much of a reaction to the sounds. She seemed to be waiting. For what was she waiting? You heard something over you. Neo slowly walked into your direction and dragged you to the middle of the room. Looking forward you saw them...

Weiss, Blake and Yang were standing on the other side of the room. They had already drawn their weapons. Three against one? You suddenly had hopes that they could rescue you. But Neo had already thought ahead. She pushed you down by putting her foot against your back. You were laying face first on the metal floor. You could hear the three girls yell your name. Neo was using you as a hostage.

You heard Yang charge forward and felt a sharp object on your back. You screamed as it drove into your flesh. Yang stopped. She couldn't do anything as long as Neo had you. Every attempt to rescue you would lead to you getting hurt. Neo pulled you of the ground and put you in front of her.She wanted the girls to see what she was going to do to you now.

You could feel her breath on the back of your neck. Neo also wanted you to see the shocked faces of your teammates. You knew what Neo was about to do. You knew that she wanted the girls to see how she ate you in front of their eyes. She wanted to see them falling apart as they could do nothing to rescue you. But she didn't thought about the possibility that you still had some fighting spirit inside of you.

Would you knock her away from you by hitting her with the back of your head?
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: Skip to tomorrow

choices: Neo kills Yang and eats you
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
You winked at Yang to show that you were up to something. As Neo tried to grab you again, you crouched down. Annoyed she tried to grab you again only to be then hit by the back of your head. Your vision was blurry and you felt immense pain but you had to focus. While Neo was distracted you crawled out of the range of Yang who began to charge again.

Weiss and Blake advanced further into the train. Not before Weiss gave you a look of concern however. You crawled to a nearby wall to rest. You couldn't walk like that. Meanwhile Neo had focused again and it didn't look good for Yang. Everytime she tried to hit Neo, the small girl either dodged her attack or parried them. Nothing came through Neo's defense. You would have tried to help her if you could but you had no energy to do so.

Neo used Yang's attacks to make her tired before changing to a more offensive strategy. She now began to hit Yang with her umbrella. The now tired Yang couldn't react in time to what Neo had to throw at her. It didn't take long before Yang was laying on the ground defeated. Neo looked into your direction before pulling a very sharp object out of her umbrella. She smiled at you before she tried to stab Yang with it.

She wanted to show you that even your friends couldn't help you. Even they would die if they tried to do something. There was no escape. Neo would always win.
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: You knock Neo away from you

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
Just before Neo could execute Yang a red glow emitted from the middle of the room. A person dressed in red appeared out of the light. Judging by her hair and clothes you could see that it was a woman. She didn't say anything. She just draws her sword and silently challenges Neo to a duel.

Neo had a look of fear on her face. What? Why did Neo fear this person? Neo then vanished with some sort of teleportation. Atleast she was gone now. The woman put her sword down again and noticed you. Her face was covered by a mask so you couldn't see what she was up to.

Just looking at her gave you chills. She emitted this feeling of intimidation. Was she even on your side. She just helped you and Yang but something wasn't quite right.
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: Raven appears

choices: Have a sparring match with Yang
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
The woman looked at Yang as she slowly came back to her senses. Without hesitation the Woman then cut through the air with her sword and another red glowing light appeared. She then walked into it and dissappeared. Yang looked at the spot where the woman just had vanished. She stood up and went over to you. "Do you think you can walk? ":was her only question completly ignoring what just had happened.

"I don't think so. ":You said looking down at your body. The scars were still deep. Yang then saw the letters on your chest. You noticed her interest:"It's nothing. Just get me out of here. Please. We can discuss this later. I just don't want her to come back and do that to me again. " The message was clear for Yang. She pulled you up and put your arm around her neck. "Are you comfortable with me getting you out of here naked? Don't you want something to cover your body up? ":she asked.

What Question was this? Of course you wanted something to cover your body with but you knew there was no time and Yang probably hasn't much she could give you. "Nah I'm fine as long as we get out of here. This reminds me. Where are we? ":You asked. "In a train that heads to vale through an underground tunnel. Oh and it also explodes. ":Yang answered. "Wonderful. ":You said sarcastically.

The both of you manage to get out of the train and on it's roof where you meet up with the rest of the team. Ruby immediately hugs you :"Oh god you are still alive. " "Could you save this for later? We have a problem in front of us. ":Weiss said and pointed to the wall that came closer:" Quick come closer to me. " As you all come closer Weiss forms an ice shield around all of you. Then with a big smash you hit the wall.

As you slowly come back to your senses you felt someone drag you away. You then saw the familiar red color as Ruby slowly became more clear in your eyes. Now your arm was around her shoulder and she dragged you to safety. Looking around you saw that you reached vale. You could hear screams behind you. Gunshots and roars could also be heard. The grim were near.

"Where are you taking me? ":You asked. "To a hospital. You need to rest and be treated. " Then your vision became blurry again. The next thing you could remember was that you woke up in a bed. The pain you felt before now didn't hurt as much anymore. Looking to your right side you saw a rose with a card beside it. It read: "Dear (?). We hope that you recover soon. Remember we will take part in the vytal tournament. Oh and of course we will visit you. Next friday to be exact. See you then. Your teammates"

They had all signed the letter and judging from the way Ruby's name was written it was obvious that she had written the letter. That would explain why there was a rose beside it and why it was a bit informal. The next days were refreshing for you. Sure you still had nightmares about Neo and occassionally panicked without any real reason but atleast you didn't always have to fear for your life.

It didn't take long for your teammates to visit you. They had all been waiting to hear your story. Ruby even brought her dog Zwei with her. Her dad send him to her as you were "away". "Guess I'm not the only boy in this team anymore. ":You said. All of you were laughing and had a good time. Well except for Blake. She was still beaten down by the fact she got you into this situation. "Don't blaim yourself for what happened. I was the one to decide to go with you and I almost got out there if it weren't for this Neo girl who caught me."

Blake tried to smile a bit but you knew that what you said didn't really help. "About this Neo girl. What did she do to you exactly? ":Weiss asked. "She tortured me mentally and physically. She scarred my whole body, tried to eat me and even raped me.":you said. The girls looked at you scared. You could feel Ruby already giving you a tight hug. With tears in her eyes she said :"I will never let anyone do this to you again. " You could feel your own tears rolling down your cheeks.

"And what happened to your collar? ":Weiss asked as she noticed it was missing. "She took it from me and gave me this instead." You showed them your chest. Neo's snack was still written on it but it wasn't bloody anymore. You could now also feel Weiss hugging you from the side as she teared up too :"Don't ever get into such an situation again. Promise me that. "

Although that was impossible you promised it to her. There would surely happen something like that again. You knew it. As long as Neo was still out there. "Next time we meet those guys we will all fight them together and win. ":Yang said.

As you finished your story they started to inform you about what they had done while you were away. They were too busy to look for you to go to the party at first but they weren't allowed to go to the southeast. So they had to go to the party instead. Some woman was causing trouble as the girls were on the party. In the aftermath they were allowed to search for you but only if Dr.Oobleck accompanied them.

They you discussed about the vytal tournament. Yang wanted to have a little sparring with you once you would be able to fight again. This should be a good training so you gave her a yes. Ruby and Weiss had something else in mind. Ruby just wanted to spend some time with you and Weiss wanted to have a long talk with you. And she probably wanted to give you something for your lost collar.

As you were back to 100% you decided to..

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
The tournament was just around the corner. You just had to train for it. Otherwise your team might lose. And finally you had a chance to show the girls that you were a capable fighter. Since you started here at beacon you have never really fought anyone. It was finally time to change that.

Ruby and Weiss understood your decision. They didn't want to lose either. Although they left the room with sunken heads. You could meet them after you had finsihed your training. Yang was pumped to finally see your fighting style. She jumped up and down to warm herself up while the both of you went to the arena inside beacon. This sparring match would be done without weapons. You both agreed that using them would probably lead to some injuries. You just thought about the sawblade mode of "saw and loon". Yeah you didn't want to cut Yang in half by accident if you got her aura too low.

"Are you ready? ":She asked excited. "Of course. ":You answered. Then without a warning she charged at you. But you had one advantage. She didn't know your semblence. Seeing everything two times slower would give you enough time to dodge everything she could throw at you. You could make her tired just like Neo did.

"Are you going to attack too or is dodging everything you can do?": Yang said getting a bit frustrated about not landing a single punch. Until now you didn't think about actually fighting back. "Alright Yang Xiao Long prepare yourself for my offensive mode. ":You said and punched her in the stomach. Yang didn't even flinch. "Was this everything you can do? ":she laughed.

She just took the punch as if it was nothing. Were you really that weak? Well most of the time you just used saw and loon to cut or shoot your way through your enemies. Without them you were just a guy who was really good at dodging and reacting to stuff. Yang took the opportunity to grab your arm and lift you over her head. "Let's see how durable your aura is. " With that she smashed you down to the ground.

Your aura took the hit and didn't immediately break. It did however deplete by 20%. You can't take hits like this forever. Yang didn't stop. She tried to hurt you with her whole bodyweight by jumping and landing on you. "You're done for. ":she shouted. You saw her fall down slowly with a smile of victory. Then it happened. You pushed yourself off the ground and kicked her in the stomach. This time she reacted with a gasp. She had definitely felt it this time.

Yang landed on her padded butt as you were back on your feet again. You didn't made another pretentious comment. You just gave her a challenging look. She was now in the position you were in a few seconds ago. But she gave you a big smile. She was liking this. "Finally waking up I see. Let's see if you are able to keep up with this. "

"C'mon take your chance. Hit me when I'm in my most vulnerable state. ":She said. This was obviously a trap. "You think this will work on me? I know exactly what you want to do." :You said. I have to see if you are capable in that regard too. Or are you to scared too hit me?"

You could get behind the idea of showing Yang your offensive side so that she could train you a little bit better but her grin and her taunt suggested other motives. I mean it could always happen in the tournament so it's better to be prepared. "

" Yang assured you:" Trust me that's exactly why this will surprise them. Don't go for their upper body. Attack them on their legs. Let them fall down. And then you can finish them. "

The thought of this being a trap slowly drifted into the back of your head. What Yang said made suddenly alot of sense to you. "Alright let's do it. ":You said. "Ok but be ready. I will of course try to counter you. We have to take this possibility into consideration. If you are too slow I will pin you down with my butt and if that happens in a real fight, you're done for. So be fast. ":Yang said

Without hesitation you charge at her and try to kick her feet away.

"Ok. Ok. I stand up. ":Yang said as she finally stopped ignoring you. As she tries to stand up, she stops all of the sudden. "Oh no. ":she said. "What is it? ":You try to say. But you didn't need an answer. A loud fart escaped her behind. A harbinger of what was to come.

You tried to move, push Yang off of you. You shouted but it all was for nothing. Yang didn't move. She didn't seem to hear you. She just pushed without a second thought. You could feel her padded behind expand under the mess, smelled her dirty deed.

":Yang's words managed to make a little smile apear on your face. "Tomorrow I will beat you Yang. Trust me. ":You said. "That's the spirit. ":Yang said.

Your next stop was Weiss. She was waiting on a bench outside the academy. As soon as she saw you a little smile formed on her lips. "I was wondering when you would come around. ":she said in her usual tone. "Yeah. The training was a bit... let's just say emotional. ":you said and sat down beside her. "Do you want to talk about it? ":she asked. "I was reminded of the torture. ":You answered. You chose against telling her what Yang did.

She somehow knew that it would make you feel better if she changed the subject.

She was always looking for a way to find you. To make up for her mistake and I just pressured her even more. I didn't help. I was just angry about her. I...I..."

":You hugged her. Weiss stopped crying as her breathing got slower and slower. After a few minutes she was sleeping in your lap, her head rested on your right shoulder.

As soon as I pet her head she just melts away. But it's really not the place or time to talk here. Weiss just cried away all of her troubles and I really don't want to wake her up again. Let's go somewhere else. You too Blake. ":You whispered as you saw Blake trying to avoid your attention.

Where do you go?
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: Time with Weiss

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
You decided to go to the library. There would be no one that could disturb you there and Weiss would get her sleep. On the way there Ruby constantly clinched to your arm while Yang was walking beside you, chatting with her. Blake just went after you. Silent. You had the feeling she would rather avoid this meeting with you. But it had to happen. Otherwise she would doubt herself for the rest of her life.

As you entered the library you sat down on one of the tables. Ruby insisted on sitting beside you. Blake and Yang sat down on the other side of the table. Blake didn't look up. You didn't quite know what to say. In your imagination this was far easier. "I heard what you did for me.":you began. Was this a good start? Hopefully. Blake again didn't look up. Did she know you were talking to her?

You tried again :"Blake. You stayed awake just because you wanted to rescue me." She moved a bit but she still didn't look up. Maybe you should tell her that it wasn't her fault: "Blake. C'mon it wasn't your fault that I was captured. " Still no eye contact. "But it was. ":she finally spoke. "If anyone is to blaim here it's me. I decided to go with you and I should've have known better. ":you said. Blake looked up:"But it was me who destroyed the lights leaving you inside the building with those guys. "
