She gave you an angry look:" Oh so Ruby wasn't enough? We heard you two in there. I can't wait till you bang Blake in there. "

"What is your problem? I asked him to do this to me. There is nothing wrong with that. ":Weiss said. "My problem? He was playing around with my sisters body. He raped her. ":Yang said. Weiss opened her mouth but you stopped her. Now it was your turn to counter:" Isn't that a bit hypocritical of you? I mean you were the one to sit down on my face to pleasure yourself." Weiss gave Yang a surprised look:" You did what? " You continued:"Granted you stopped doing it, but only after I asked you to. Ruby was practically begging me to pleasure her. She didn't try to stop me. She wanted it. I know you just want to protect your little sister but trust me, you aren't the one that should decide what's good for her and what's not. She can decide that for herself. She is old enough. "

"I get that. I just...":Yang began. "What Yang? You want that too? Are you just jealous that he does this for us? ":Weiss interrupted her. "Weiss stop.":You said. Weiss looked back into your face:"But..." Giving her a pat on her padded butt you shoved her away from the conversation :"I get that you only want to help me but right now it would be better if I do this myself. Please understand that. " Weiss gave you one last look before walking to her bed:"As you wish. "

Reacting like Weiss did earlier wouldn't help in this situation. Yang had to see that you are reasonable. That you would listen to what she had to say. Otherwise there would be a conflict in your team that might cost you the victory in the tournament. "It's ok you can talk. ":you said. "What I wanted to say is I don't want that anything bad happens to her. I might have overreacted but what would you do if you saw something like that? I know that she can decide for herself if she wants you to do that or not. "

You put your arm on her shoulder:"It's ok. How about you let out some steam in a nice sparring match. We wanted to do that anyway. " Yang looked at you and said:
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: Ruby sleeping in her bed

choices: You take a shower with Yang
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
"I think that would be a good way to think of something else. ":Yang said. So the two of you left the room to train. The arena was completly empty so no one would interfere. As you were standing there you thought about wir the maybe wasn't the best idea. You nearly passed out two times this day. This would surely have an effect on your fighting.

Yang looked completly relaxed however. Well, an hour ago she was sleeping in her bed while you had "fun" with Ruby. Of course she would have more energy than you. "Ready?":she asked. "Let's do it. ":you said. Clearly you weren't ready. But you two needed this training.

Yang didn't wait for you to make the first move. She knew you would start this fight off by being defensive. She quickly charged at you and gave you little time to react. But you managed to dodge in the last moment. Your reaction time got worse because of your sleepiness. Otherwise you would have reacted much sooner. Even your semblance was affected a bit by it.

Yang could use this to her advantage. She knew that you were vulnerable now. She just had to hit you fast enough to get through your defense and from that point on you would lose. The smartest way to get out of this situation would be to get as far away from her as possible and think of a way to trick her.

She wasn't really a defensive fighter so you just had to get her to fall down. Maybe with the move she taught you. Once she would lay on the ground the rest should be easy. As Yang began to punch you again you took your chance to grab her arm and turn her around. While she couldn't see you, you ran to the other side of the room. You needed as much time as possible for this to work. As soon as she would charge at you, you had to find the right time to bring down both of her legs and let her fall down.

Looking over to Yang you noticed that she had you back in her sights. Your heartbeat accelerated. In a few seconds she would charge back at you. This just had to work. This time she wouldn't counter it. No. This time you would beat her. "Are you trying to hide from me? Are you scared? ":she was just messing with you again. This was just part of her tactic to let you lose your focus. You wouldn't fall for that.

In fact you would use it against her: "Oh you know. I thought you could use some walking with those big hips of yours. Must be very hard to sit down with that. Or did you just mess yourself again? I thought I smelled something. " You could see her expression changing to angry. Making Yang angry wasn't that good of an idea but that would make her lose her focus. "Big hips...?":she said:" That's it. Now you are done for. "

Yang began to charge at you. If she would hit you, you would definately not stand up again. Now it counts. If you would act too soon or too late she would get you. She had to stand one to three meter in front of you. Thanks to your semblance that shouldn't be a problem. Hopefully it would work. Your sleepiness seemed completly gone because of the rush of adrenaline.

Yang was now seconds away from you. A few seconds later and she would punch you into the next wall. Now would be the time to strike. You slid into her direction kicking away one of her legs. But Yang could still hold her balance. Now that you were almost behind her you grabbed her other leg and let her fall down on her face first. Last time you kicked away both of her legs causing her to fall down where she stood. This wasn't as effective as your new approach. By grabbing her second leg later you could slide down under her and avoid her trapping you under her butt.

She couldn't counter that. Now you had to act quick in order for her to not stand up again. You threw yourself on her back and held her down with your weight. As long as she couldn't punch you, she shouldn't be able to escape. You could feel her squirm under you. "You lost Yang. I told you I could beat you. ":You said. Yang didn't stop to squirm. "Raaghh let me go. I want to punch you in the face for what you've said. ":she said still angry. "Yang. I was just joking back there. I don't think you have big hips. ":you said in an attempt to calm her down.

But Yang was furious. She wasn't listening. You had to find her weakspot in order to calm her down. Maybe you should use the old trick and pat her head. It worked with Weiss. Maybe it would work with Yang too. So you began to pat her head. But as soon as you touched her hair she grew even more angry. Yang didn't seem to like other people touching her hair.

You began to think of other possible weakspots Yang could have. Maybe she was ticklish? It was worth a try. Otherwise she might throw you off of her if this goes on. You began to tickle her under her armpits. You knew that this is a weak spot for someone who is ticklish. Your dad always tickled you there as you were little. Yang couldn't help herself but laugh. She just couldn't stop. And while doing so she completly forgot why she was angry in the first place.

"Stop...stop.. I...I... can't.... I... give up. ":Yang said in between laughing. You however had to much fun to stop. Her pleads only made you tickle her more. She should feel beaten. Not give up. Yang was squirming around like crazy. You had trouble holding her under you and eventually she managed to throw you off of her. You landed on your back. No!You had to get back on top of her and hold her down. But too late, Yang already jumped on top of you.

Looking into your eyes she said:" I think we can call this a draw. " A draw? But she had the upperhand now. "But you pinned me down. ":you said. "After I gave up. If you would have stopped the match would be over with you as the winner but you didn't so the match went on further. ":Yang said You looked at her confused:" But wouldn't that make you... " Yang didn't let you finish your question :"Stop talking and accept your prize. " And with that she kissed you on your lips. It was a beautiful feeling and you wished it would hold on longer but you felt a sharp pain on your left cheek after it ended. "That's for calling my hips fat. ":Yang said after she had smacked you in the face.

You put your left hand on the spot where she had smacked you:"Worth it."Yang was still laying on top of you. She was panting from all the tickling and she was sweaty too. "C'mon big girl. You are ready for your shower. " Yang looked at you:"Did you just call me big? " "Well you are quite tall in comparison to the other girls. ":You said. "Hmm.I guess you are right. Anyway I would like to have my shower. Are you coming with me or do you have something else to do?"
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: That would be a good way to think of something ...

choices: Next day: You still have a few days till the tournament starts
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
"Yeah about that. I kinda already went to the shower with Weiss and I didn't really sweat during the fight.":you said and saw Yang's eyes getting red again. You know it wasn't because you went to the shower with Weiss. It was because you basically said that Yang was no match for you. "Don't take that as an insult. If I would have done a bit more, like you, I would have been sweaty too. And besides, one good placed hit from you would basically send me flying."

Yang's eyes went back to her usual color again. "Well if you say so. I go shower myself off. See you later. ":Yang said and left the arena. With Yang gone, you didn't really have a reason to stay here anymore. So you went ob to leave the arena to look after Ruby. But as soon as you walked over to the exit a gray haired young man stopped you. "I saw your fight. You know, I'm kind of new here and I wanted to meet some people to have a nice little fight. The name's Mercury Black. What's your name. ": Mercury said.

"It's (name). And could we maybe fight later? I kinda need to get back to my girlfriends. ":you said but he wasn't moving. "Could you... please. ":you said as you tried to walk past him but he always blocked your path. "You're not a bully, are you? Because I get a bit of bully vibes coming from you. ":you said a bit annoyed. "Far from it. I just really want to fight you. ":He said:" I just saw you beat a girl in a fight. You have to be strong. C'mon we are already inside an arena. "

Seeing as he wouldn't stop you agreed. Both of you went to the middle of the room and took your fighting stances. The biggest problem was that he had an advantage over you. He saw your fighting style and you didn't know his. Would he be more offensive or defensive? You couldn't read that from his body. He had his hands balled into fists facing you. His right foot stood in the front the left foot in the back.

As the fight started, both of you just stood there waiting for someone to make the first move. He knew you would try to read him so he didn't show you how he would attack. This would only help you. You began to walk sideways in a circle, he did the same mirroring your movements. He knew exactly why you started doing this, to get to him. If you would attack him from the front he might counter you. You stopped, he did the same.

"Didn't you say you wanted to... ":you began but Mercury used this as an opportunity to attack you. You saw one of his legs just nearly missing your face as you dodged. As soon as his leg came in contact with the ground, the other leg went up to try and kick you in the face but you dodged again. Seeing as attacking further would only lead you to know his fighting style he jumped backwards into a safer position. From what you saw he seemed to fight primarily with his legs. Otherwise his kicks wouldn't come so close to your face.

He looked over to you, waiting if you would try to attack him. But you hadn't enough information yet. So you began to walk sideways in a circle again. "Not this time. ":He said as something just flew past your head. You stopped. Was that really what you thought it was? Looking over to him, you saw that he had one of his legs in the air, facing you. A small hole was under his shoe and smoke came out of it. He just shot a bullet at you.

"Not fair. I don't have my..." Another bullet flew past your head. "We never agreed on not using weapons. And besides, I don't think dodging these bullets is a problem for you. ":he said and shot three bullets at you. Because of your semblance you had enough time to react, so you just slid down under them and kicked away one of Mercury legs. Since his other leg was still in the air, he began to fall down but he managed to put one hand to the ground before he reached it and catapulted himself back on his feet.

Turning around you saw him standing there doing nothing. Didn't he want to use the chance to finish you off? "What's the matter? ":you asked. "You know I don't think this fight will end anytime soon. You will always dodge my moves and you don't really try to attack me. Let's just end it here. Maybe I will see you in the tournament. I will be competing too. Later ":and he left the room.

You felt like you just wasted your time. What did he want to accomplish with that? Was there a special reason as to why he wanted to fight you? These thoughts flew through your head as you went back to your dorm. Ruby was waiting for you. She woke up in the time you were fighting. "(Name) :she said happily and jumped into your arms. "Still in your pajamas I see. ":you said hugging her close to you. "I only just woke up. I didn't really have time to dress up and it's not like we have to go outside or something. I can stay like that. "

"Well you are getting quiet heavy. How about I put you down? ":you asked. "No. I want to stay in your arms. ":Ruby said. But you could feel your arms already getting weaker. If this would go on Ruby would fall down. You of course didn't want that to happen, so you laid down on the ground and put Ruby on top of you. "Now you can stay in my arms. ":you said as you gave her a clap on her pampered bottom. Ruby didn't even feel it through the thick padding of her diaper. Ruby put her head on your chest and closed her eyes :"You know, sometimes I think about how easy I could eat you. "

You froze. Why did she had to bring that up? This moment was so nice but now she was talking about eating you. She felt your heartbeat intensify. "Don't worry. I would never do that and you know that. I just like to think about it. I mean we have been through alot and you always helped me and did everything to make me happy. But you are a boy. And normally I would have eaten you without another thought. Something about you was off tho. I just couldn't bring it over myself. I loved you from the moment you looked into my eyes. You gave me this warm feeling of love. A feeling that i never got from a male person. Well except for my dad. Or my uncle."

What Ruby said let you calm down. Yeah. She could have eaten you from the moment you first met. But she didn't, she loved you. You could feel the pressure on your body increase as Weiss layed herself down ob top of you beside Ruby. "Well I love you for making me feel special. For listening to my problems and calming me down. You did so much for me in such a short amount of time. You make my days better just by being around me and you seem like you always know what I want. ":Weiss said.

It didn't take long before the weight on top of you increased again as Yang laid down on top of you on the other side of Ruby. Her hair was still wet from the shower. "I just like the way you always try to help one of us. Even if you had problems with some of us at the start. You cared for us like a dad. And no don't think I just love you in that kinda way. I of course love you in a romantic way. I like doing things with you. "

The three girls were now all laying on top of you. "Are you coming too Blake? ":Yang asked. Blake only looked up from the book she was reading and then she looked back into it. She was feeling bad about what happened yesterday. But that didn't stop her from saying :"I like you for forgiving me for all the things I've caused. You even tried to make me feel better yesterday although I didn't deserve it. We might not share that big of an connection but you always showed me respect and love. Something I would never expect from a boy. Especially after what I usually do to them. "

Atleast Blake appreaciated what you did for her. And to be honest, you were kind of happy that she didn't also laid down on top of you. The other three girls had meanwhile closed their eyes and began to sleep. You were also a bit tired of all the fighting and the weight of the girls pushing down on you. So you closed your eyes and drifted off to sleep.
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: You do something else

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
Looking around you noticed you were back in the field of flowers. Again this person stood there in the distance. But this time you weren't that far away. You could actually see the person a bit better. It was a woman dressed in black. Her white skin was covered with red and purple veins. All she did was looking at you. Nothing more. Who was she? Why did you dream of her?

Her eyes glowed in a bright red color. Was she even human? "Who are you? ":you shouted. She didn't answer. Turning around, she proceeded to leave the scene. "Don't go away. I want to know why I see you in my dreams. " She didn't react. You tried to run after her but you could catch up. It seemed like you weren't even moving.

You could hear a voice echo through the field of flowers. It made the whole ground shake. "You will see everything fall apart. Everything you huntsman and huntresses worked so hard for." It had to be the woman's voice. But what did she mean by that. You couldn't concentrate since the ground under you began to shake more and more.

Then it opened and you fell down. You tried to stop yourself from falling by putting your hands and legs against the walls of earth around you, but you couldn't. You couldn't stop yourself from falling deeper into the hole. After awhile you could feel the walls coming closer. They began to squish you together more and more. Until you couldn't withstand the pressure anymore and... popped.

Opening your eyes, the first thing you saw were Ruby, Weiss and Yang still sleeping on top of you. Ruby was again drooling on your chest. You noticed soon that atleast one of the girls had used her diaper during her sleep. You didn't know which one however since they were all pretty close together. Blake was sitting on her bed, reading one of her books.

Other than her teammates she wasn't really the type of girl who would enjoy a long relaxing sleep. Blake soon noticed that you looked at her. She put her book to the side and looked back. Although she didn't quite look into your eyes. "Do you know what time it is? ":you whispered. "8 am. We have four hours till the tournament starts ":she whispered back.

The tournament was today? You had thought there were atleast two days to train. "What!?! ":you said, forgetting that the girls were still sleeping. What were you supposed to do now? Were you even ready yet? You didn't feel ready. What if the girls would lose because of you? You were to stressed to notice the girls moving on top of you. They were waking up.

Yang was the first one to speak. Looking at you, she said :"Morning. Ready to win this thing? " You couldn't answer. Ruby yawned:"The tournament is today? Awesome. I hope we will fight against very strong opponents." Weiss rubbed her eyes:"Ruby you should take this seriously. We will fight against the strongest huntsman and huntresses the other academys have to offer. "

But Ruby didn't seem to listen to Weiss. Instead she was holding her nose:"Eww. Weiss you stink. " So it was Weiss who had used her diaper. "Don't change the subject Ruby. This is important. ":Weiss said as she felt the mess touching her bottom. "But Ruby is right. You do stink alot. ":Yang said. "Could you please move? You are squishing me. ":You asked. "Sorry. ":The girls stood up and gave you some space.

"How much time do we have left? ":Ruby asked. "4 hours. ":you answered. "Should be enough to warm ourselves up. ":Yang said. "But you should really change Weiss's diaper (name).":Ruby said andere pointed to Weiss's behind. "This can wait Ruby. We have to be ready for the tournament. I can... stay in this thing for a bit longer. ":Weiss said. You could hear a slight sign of disgust in her voice.

You knew it would be better to change her but being ready for the tournament was also quite important. Meanwhile the girls argued about either Weiss's diaper should be changed or not. Ruby silenced them:"Guys. I'm the leader. I decide what we will do. And I decide...
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: Next Day: The tournament starts

choices: You warm up for the tournament
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
"(Name) will change you. ":Ruby said. Weiss gave her an angry look. But she had to follow her orders and you had to do the same thing. So the both of you went into the bathroom. As soon as the door was closed Weiss began to complain:" I would have done this for all of you, you know. We could have saved a bit more time if she hadn't sent us in here. We..."

You had to calm her down otherwise it would be only more complicated. So you put your finger to her mouth:"Shhh. It's ok. In here you are the queen and I'm still your loyal servant. Don't forget that. " Weiss calmed down. She seemed to remember the time where she made you her servant. It seemed like ages ago from now.

While Weiss was distracted, you slowly laid her down and pulled her dress up a bit, so that you could reach her diaper. Pulling off the tabs, you let the front of her diaper fall down. Weiss didn't even react. You quickly wiped her off, threw the used wipes into her used diaper, closed it and put a new one in it's place. By the time Weiss stopped thinking, you had already powdered her and closed her new diaper.

You lend her a hand to lift her up. She grabbed it and you pulled her into a tight hug. "Let's win this thing, ok?" :you said.

Do you want to skip the warm up?
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: (Name) will change your diaper first

choices: You have to sit the first round out
Ruby has to sit the first round out
Someone else has to sit the first round out
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
As it was finally time to go to the amity collosseum your team was standing in front of a problem. A team had to consist of four members in order to partake in the tournament. Not more, not less. The only option you had was to let one teammember sit the first round out. And that wasn't an easy decision. All of you had diffrent skills, weapons and semblences that could lead you to victory. But the challenging part was to see which combinations would be most likely to win.

Ruby of course tried to get you in the first team. She was more intrested in having fun than to actually win. Weiss was a bit more strategic and suggested that you should be used in either the double or single rounds since your semblence wouldn't help you in a fight against multiple opponents. You had to focus on one target.

In the end you all put it to a vote to see which of you should sit the fight out.
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: The vytal tournament

choices: No. Team Rwby(?) wins the fight
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
It was decided that you should sit this round out since you were way more efficient in fights against one or two enemies. Ruby wasn't that satisfied with the decision. She would have liked to finally fight in a team with you since she didn't have the chance to do that until now. Maybe the two of you could fight alongside each other in the double round.

For now the only thing you could do, is cheer for them on the sidelines. Since you are one of the combatants yourself, you could sit in the front row to cheer for the rest of your team. Right now their opponents were team ABRN. Professor Port and Dr.Oobleck were the announcers. "What a lovely day for a good match. Today we will see team Rwby(?) against team ABRN. ":said Port. "One interesting fact about team RWBY(?) is that they consist of five members. This is of course is a violation of the rules. So one of their teammates has to sit this fight out. ":said Oobleck.

"But let's don't drag this out for too long. Let the battle begin. And just as a reminder, no one get's eaten during the match. This would lead to disqualification. ":said Port. And so the teams began to fight. You did everything you could to cheer for the girls. But does someone use the chance to sneak up on you?
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: You have to sit the first round out

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
As you were watching the girls fight, you were quite thankful that you weren't down there with them. Having to fight a whole group of people had to be very hard, since it would be almost impossible to focus on everyone on the same time.

This was especially appearent as you saw Ruby shooting at one of her opponents from the distance. The boy was too focused on fighting the other girls to notice Ruby. As a result he got hit and stumbled backwards. And this was exactly the reason you like to keep your fights one on one.

It was far better to concentrate on only one opponent. And this way your semblence was way more useful. The fight went on for a few minutes before your team finally came out on top. "And the winner is team Rwby(?)":Ports voice could be heard through the speakers.

You could hear the booming sounds of cheering and hands clapping all around you. Ruby looked over to you and gave you a thumbs up. You returned the gesture. The girls left the arena and sat down next to you.

"Did you see that?":Ruby asked. "Of course I did.":you responded. "We just wiped the floor with them.":Yang said. "Now that we have a bit of freetime I say we should go down to the festival. I think the four of you are probably very hungry by now and I know you wouldn't dare to eat me but I don't want to risk anything. ":you suggest.
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: No. Team Rwby(?) wins the fight

choices: You want to compete in the doubles round
You want to compete in the last round
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
"I may have worked up an appetite.":Blake said before a loud growl emitted from her stomach. Blake put her hands in front of her stomach in embarrasment. "I know just the place to eat something.":Yang said.

As you finally reached the festival, you all follow Yang, but Weiss suddenly stops as she hears a ringtone on her Scroll. "What's the matter Weiss?":you asked. Weiss glares down at her scroll:"It's nothing." As she puts the device away you could swear that you saw the word "Father" on the display.

"Hey! Might be hard to eat without this.":said a green haired girl, not far away from you. She held a wallet in her hand. Ruby panicked and started to pat all over her clothes, searching for her wallet:" No, no, no, no!"

The green haired girl laughs:"Good to see you, Ruby." They knew each other? Well there was plenty of time for them to meet one another while you were gone. While you were in deep thoughts, Ruby took the wallet back from the girl and put it away:"Oh! Thanks, Emerald! Oh. Guess I dropped it. Girl pockets are the worst!"

"What's up, Em?":Yang asked. "Just left the stadium after your amazing fight! You guys were awesome!":Emerald responded. You could see Ruby blushing and mumbling beside you. Blake didn't seem to mind that and asked: "I heard your team progressed to the next round too."

"You know, I feel that we haven't seen your other teammates.":Weiss said. Since you had no idea who Emerald's teammates could be, you were a bit curious too. "How'd they do in the fight?":Yang asked. Emerald tilts her head up in thought:"Really well."

"That's great. Uh. Why don't we all go and get a victory food together.":Ruby suggest. "Oh, gosh, that's so nice of you, but my teammates are all kind of... ":she looks back at the person standing behind her. To your surprise it was Mercury, the guy who so desperately wanted to fight you yesterday. He just stood there sniffing at a boot. "...introverted. Really socially awkward.":Emerald finishes her sentence.

Yang nodded:"Ooh, yeah, I could see that." "Oh yeah, looks like Merc and I are going to move on to the doubles round. What about you guys?":Emerald asked.

Ruby put her hands on her hips proudly:"Well, as the leader of this team, I thought long and hard about this decision."

Weiss pops up in front of Ruby: "We haven't decided that yet. " Ruby was getting a bit nervous: Yes, because as I said, I thought long and hard about this decision. And the only reason as to why I still don't know who will compete in the doubles round is that it is really hard."

"We'll probably use Yang and (name). Especially since he didn't fight yet and this gives us an advantage." Yang pounded her fists together:"Yeah, we're going to kick some butt!" Emerald laughed:"Well, if Mercury and I see you down the line, don't think we'll go easy on ya."

After that Emerald turned and walked away:"Alright, well we're going to catch some more fights." Ruby waved her arm:"Have fun!" Emerald waved back:"See you later!" As you were sure they were far enough away you began to tell the girls what happened yesterday.

"So this Mercury guy. He seems a bit weird.":You began. "Yes he does. ":Yang said. "Yesterday after we trained, he stopped me from getting back into our dorm. He said he wanted to fight me, but once he realised the fight would only go on for ages, he just quit. Why?"

"Oh he did that before with Pyrrha. He said he had no chance winning against her. No clue as to why he would even voluntarily fight her then. ":Ruby said. "The only thing he did while fighting me was analysing my moves and trying to find a weak spot.":you said:"And I thought we hadn't yet decided in which round I will be used in. "

"Well I thought it would be a good idea to put you in a team with Yang, since the two of you trained with each other. ":Blake said. "C'mon this will be easy. You know how I fight and I know how you fight. We're perfectly synchronized. ":Yang said.

Do you want to compete in the doubles round or in the last round?
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: You go to the festival

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
"It's not that I don't want to do it and sure it is an advantage that almost no one has seen me fight yet. But besides Yang, you didn't see me fight either. So I don't quite know if you are betting on the right person here.":You said.

"Don't say that. You told us about what you went through while you were in captivity.":Weiss began. Both you and Blake shuddered at the thought of what had happened. She was still feeling guilt for it and you didn't really wanted to be reminded about the torture either.

But Weiss didn't stop:"You were the one that lived through all of this and now you doubt your capability as a fighter?" "Weiss I don't think this is in any way related to... ":You began but were stopped by Weiss:"I don't want to hear it. If surviving all of this without losing your faith in us rescuing you isn't an indication of your strength. I don't know what is."

"Huh?":said a confused Ruby. "She is talking about mental strength.":you explained:"But I still don't quite know why this is enough for you to believe in me." Weiss put a hand on your shoulder:"There is more than that."

Yang hit you in the side:"You... and me... losing? Never. I've seen you in action. And even without your weapons you managed to beat me."

But this wasn't where your fight had ended. "You managed to escape my grip anyway.":you said. Yang was trying to punch your side again but this time you were expecting it and dodged.

"And this is exactly why I want you to be my partner. ":she said. "Because I was too foolish and I let you win?":you asked. "No because you... ":she was trying to punch you again, but like the last time, she missed:"...can dodge like a champ. You will make our opponents tired and I will finish them off. And remember, this time you are allowed to use your weapons. Shoot on them, make them dance. And once they come close, you will just dodge everything they throw at you. "

Before you could even answer an enourmous growl could be heard. "Could you please hurry? I'm starving.":Ruby said. "Fine. I'll do it.":you said. The fact that Yang already had a strategy for you in mind calmed you down a bit. If you would follow the plan how could you even lose? And besides, it's not like you don't have any experience with making your opponent tired. You did that before.

Yang had meanwhile led the team to one of the huts stringed with paper lanterns with a sign overhead saying A Simple Wok. You take a seat on the stools outside, as you waited for the owner to take your order.

It was Yang who ordered her food first:"I'll have a bowl of the regular, please." Immediately a large bowl of noodles slid in front of her. Ruby stared at Yang's meal:"Oohhh... I'll take the same." Another large bowl of noodles slid in front of Ruby, as she clasps her hands in excitement.

"Do you have anything with a low-salt ...?":Weiss asked. And again another bowl of noodles slid in front of her. "Um... okay...":Weiss said. "Oh oh the same as the others but with sauce.":you said. A bowl of noodles with a yellow sauce slid in front of you:"Yes."

Blake only gave a nod and smile to the Shopkeep. He rushed through one door of his shop and came out the other to leave a large bowl of noodles topped with fish in front of her. You could see Blake's eyes glimmer as she began to drool from looking at her meal. Weiss offered her credit card to the Shopkeep to pay for the food.

But the card is quickly flung back at her, and the annoyed Shopkeep pointed to his register. "What?! How can my card be declined? I was barely into my monthly allowance!":said Weiss.

Blake looked from left to right as she attempted to slowly slide her bowl closer to herself before the Shopkeep took it out of her hands with. Defeated she rested her head on the counter in front of her:" Nooo!!"

You could hear their stomachs roar. If they wouldn't get something into them an accident is about to happen. "Well... I'll go... somewhere... more safe. ":You said as you slowly stood up. But a voice stopped you:"Maybe I could help?" Looking to your left, you saw Pyrrha and the rest of team JNPR approaching the stand.

"Aw, you don't have to ...":Yang said. But Blake wasn't going to let this chance fly by:"But she could!!!" You were fully on her side with this. But for diffrent reasons. This would prevent them from eating someone. Remembering what happened the last time Blake ate someone was enough horror. You didn't want to live through this again.

"Well, I think you all earned it after that battle.":Pyrrha said. You let out an audible "phew" and sat back down on your stool. "Mind if we join you?":asked Jaune. As soon as Pyrrha paid for the food, you could see Blake's head dissapearing into her bowl as she began to gorge all of the food up in an immense speed. This was a huge contrast to Weiss's method of eating. She took her time and was careful to not get herself dirty. You only looked down at your meal before you began to slurp the first noodles up.

Later on as the bowls were empty and most of you felt satisfied with their meals. Well except for Jaune, who was feeling sick. Ren turned to Pyrrha:"Are you sure it's wise to have eaten before a fight?" "Of course! It will give us energy! And it will prevent Nora from eating the competetion.":Pyrrha explained followed by a loud belch of Nora.

"If I barf, I'm blaming you.":Jaune said sickly. "Ooh! Aim at the enemy!":Nora suggested. "Nora, that's disgusting. But if you feel the urge ...":Ren said. Jaune only gave a thumbs up to that:"Got it." Pyrrha then stood up from her stool:"Well, we should be off."

"Good luck out there. ":Ruby said waving after them as they left their stools:"So what are we going to do now?" Ruby scratched her chin as Blake laid down on the counter. So what do you do?
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: You want to compete in the doubles round

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
"It would be helpful for us to see their fight. ":You began:" Because that way we can prepare a better strategy if we have to face them later down the line." Ruby gave you an reproachful look. "And... of course we should go there because they are our friends.":you said.

"Well he isn't wrong. It would be beneficial for all of us to see the diffrent teams fight. That way we will already know their strategy before they can even use it against us. It's not like they aren't doing the same thing while we fight. ":Weiss said. You could feel in her voice how proud she was that you thought like her.

"Yeah. Knowing your opponent is a key component of winning a fight. ":said Yang. "Am I right Blake?" Blake only laid there on the counter, not saying a word. "Blake? Blake? I think she is asleep.":Yang said. "Anyway I think we all agree on watching their fight.":Ruby said:"But how do we get Blake away from here?"

"Leave that to me ":Yang said as she easily lifted Blake up. You tried to be the gentleman. "Don't you think I should take care of her?":you asked. "No offense but you are weaker than me. ":Yang said. "C'mon I'm just trying to be nice.":you said. "Well if you insist on it. ":Yang said as she put Blake on your back. You immediately began to shake a bit under her weight. But you put both of your hands under her padded butt and secured her on your back.

"You know what? This could actually be a good training for you to build up some muscles. ":Yang said and laughed. "Yeah... that's... what I... had in mind":you said sarcastically. "Well then hurry up. We don't want to be late for the fight. ":Yang said as she and the others already walked back to the ship to the colosseum.

It was a long walk back and having Blake on your back only made it even longer. While you had trouble to walk in a straight line, Blake rested her head on your shoulder, completly unaware of what was happening. Ruby and the others had built up some distance to you by now and you had trouble keeping up.

But you had other things to worry about. The girls had chosen you to fight alongside Yang in the doubles round. You didn't want to dissapoint them. But what if your opponents would focus their attacks on you, making in harder for you to use your semblence? Or what if they would focus on Yang while you were unable to help her?

These thoughts flew through your head as you entered the ship to the colosseum. Putting Blake on a seat beside you, you sighed. Yang wasn't wrong. This was certainly a good training. The flight didn't take long and soon the five of you were sitting in the colosseum.

The loud sounds of the audience began to wake Blake up. She put a hand on her forehead:"Ughh. Where am I?" She looked around. "We're back in the colosseum. ":you said. Meanwhile team JNPR was fighting team BRNZ. "Wha... ":Blake began but Yang interupted her:"They're winning." A big pink heart was shot out of Nora's grenade launcher in the direction of team BRNZ.

But then teams stopped fighting."Uhh... what are they doing?":Ruby asked. "Looks like they are arguing about something. ":you said. The next thing you saw was Nora knocking every single member of team BRNZ out of the ring. "Yeah don't let her come close to you if we have to fight them. ":you could hear Yang say. "I wasn't planning on doing that. "

The next match was team NDGO vs. team SSSN. "An all girls team versus an all boys team? This can't go well. Oh no, Sun. ":Blake said, now fully awake. "Calm down. They're not allowed to eat them, remember? It's against the rules. ":Weiss said. "I know but...it's still a bit... dangerous. "

"I'm sure they will do just fine. Nothing to worry about. ":you said while a thought ran through your head. Why was Blake concerned about Sun but suggested to send you to the doubles round without any concern? You are her teammate after all. But there was no time to think about that as the battle began.

You could see how team SSSN immediately tried to corner the girls of team NDGO but strangely they didn't do anything. They just stood there. "What are they doing there Weiss? ":Ruby asked. "Why are you asking me? How should I know?":Weiss said. "Well you were the one always talking about strategies here. So I thought you would know. ":Ruby said.

"I can only tell you what they are trying to do after they already made a move.":Weiss explained. "Well looks like you can start with that now. ":you said and pointed to one of the girls moving away from her team. "I say she is trying to distract the boys, while the other girls will attack them in the meantime. ":Weiss said. You looked back at the rest of the girls. Something wasn't right.

Why were they shouting at her? As if she was doing something she wasn't supposed to do. She was walking into the direction of the boys. "And why are they shouting at her? Looks like she is doing something they haven't planned. ":you said. "It's all... part of their act... I guess. ":Weiss said. She had no clue. You could hear it in her voice.

Meanwhile the boys took notice of the girl heading their way and prepared for combat. But before they could even react, the girl already jumped on one of them. She began to move his head into her mouth. The other girls walked up to her, trying their best to stop her from what she was planning to do. "She is trying to eat him. But this way they get disqualified. ":Ruby said. As the girls finally pulled their teammate of of the boy it was already too late.

"Eating your opponent is against the rules. Even the attempt of it. Therefore team NDGO is disqualified and team SSSN goes to the next round.":Oobleck's voice rang through the speakers. It was incredibly silent inside the colosseum. Instead of cheering for team SSSN, most of the audience left the colosseum or just sat there frozen in place. Even the members of team SSSN weren't that happy with this victory. You could see how the girl began to tear up because of what she just attempted to do.

Her teammates helped her to stand up again and escorted her out of the colosseum. "Let's go. I think I've seen enough for one day. ":Blake said as she stood up and went to the exit. Yang imediately went after her:"We'll meet up in our dorm, ok?" You still sat there thinking about what just happened. What if one of your teammates would snap and do the same? The tournament would be over in seconds.

"So are we going to follow them?":Weiss asked. "Oh. Yes... sure. ":you replied and stood up. A large shadow went over the colosseum, making you look up. A white ship flew right over the colosseum in the direction of beacon. "She is here. ":Weiss said. "Who is here?":Ruby and you said in unison. "Winter. ":Weiss replied and ran out of the colosseum.

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
Ruby and you catch up with Weiss as she stands in front of the airship. Ruby had to take a moment to catch her breath. The door of the airship opens and a woman dressed in a white uniform left it. A big bulge was visible in her pants. She bore a striking resemblance to Weiss. "Winter.":Weiss said:"Winter! I'm so happy to see you! Oh... Your presence honors us."

Winter looked around as she began to approach Weiss:"Beacon... It's been a long time. The air feels... different." Ruby replied:" I mean it is fall, so, eh, it's probably colder." Her comment led to Weiss punching her in the shoulder. Weiss then turned back to her sibling:"So, what are you doing here?"

Winter answered the question with one word:"Classified." Weiss asked annother question:"Oh, right. Well, how long are you staying?" Again Winter answered it with:"Classified." Weiss seemed to be used to this. She smiled and said:"Of course."

A moment of silence occured, only to be broken by Ruby:"Well... this is nice... I think." Weiss was now very excited:"You're going to love it here! I know you travel a lot, but so much of Beacon is different from Atlas! Vale, too. The government and school are completely separate! Can you believe it!? I-"

Winter cut her off:"I'm more than familiar with how this kingdom handles its... bureaucracy. That is not why I came." Weiss apologized:"Right! I'm sorry!" Winter continued:"Nor did I come here to watch my own blood fail so miserably in battle. But it appears that I have no choice in the matter."

What was she talking about? The girls did phenomenal. Weiss shared your confusion:"But, we won." Winter didn't seem to care about that:"Only a novice would refer to that as a victory. I counted at least three strikes missed." You didn't see the problem with missing your opponent. If you win in the end it's pointless to think about it. But you didn't want to speak up to Winter. She didn't seem like the person who would waste time arguing with someone like you.

Turning around to her guards, Winter instructed them to leave:"Leave us." Her guards obey, stepping backwards into formation. Winter sighs and puts on a warmer smile, dropping her military act:"How have you been?"

Weiss responds happily:"Oh, splendid! Thank you for asking. I'm actually in the very top ranking of our sparring class! And the rest of my studies are going wonderfully, too! I'm-"

Winter cuts her off by slapping Weiss's head:"Silence, you boob! I don't recall asking about your ranking, I'm asking how you've been. Are you eating properly? Have you taken up any hobbies? Are you making new friends?"

Weiss looked over to you, clearly unsure if she should reveal her relationship with you to her sister. Maybe Winter wouldn't accept you. But Winter wasn't dumb, she noticed how Weiss looked at you and figured it out:"Do you feel affection for this boy?" Weiss hesitated. One wrong move could lead to you being eaten by Winter.

Winter gave you a cold look, scanning your body. Once again you were in a situation that determined your life or death. But this time you were facing a fully trained huntress. You didn't dare to utter a word. It would mean nothing to Winter. As a huntsman (in training) you were inferior to her. All she sees in you is food. If Weiss wouldn't answer, this would be your end.

All the while Ruby just stood beside the three of you, wondering what was happening. She never was in such a situation before. Yang didn't judge Ruby's decision to start a relationship with you. But it was common that female family members of a huntress did. Often times a relationship shattered just because a family member didn't think that the loved one of the huntress was worthy.

"I ask you again Weiss, are you in a relationship with this boy?":Winter's voice sounded more angry than before. Weiss had to act now before it was too late. But she didn't. "She...":you began, only to be stopped by Winter:"I didn't ask you...food." You could see Weiss shake. She didn't want to lose you. But even if she would tell Winter the truth, there was no guarrantee that she would spare you.

The general turned back to Winter:"Is that right?" Winter seemed like a little child now, looking around for something to say but ultimately she looked down in defeat. "And you.":Ironwood begins. Qrow pointed to himself. "What are you doing here?"

As Ironwood and Winter leave, Penny saw Ruby and waved to her, while Ruby waved back. Moments later you saw Ruby leaping onto her uncle's arm.

A word, please.":Qrow looks over to see Ozpin waiting for him, as he let's Ruby fall to the ground. Meanwhile Professor Goodwitch repaired the courtyard using her telekinesis.

"I think I'm in trouble.":Qrow said to Ruby. "You did kinda tear up our courtyard.":Ruby added. "Yeah, I did.":he said as he winked and gave her a fist bump:"Catch ya later, kid." Then followed the others.

Weiss and you walked over to Ruby as Weiss began to speak:"And suddenly, your recklessness makes sense." Ruby gave her a grin:"You're just mad because he whooped butt." Weiss didn't think so:"That was a draw, at best!"

"So why did they fight anyway?":you asked. Weiss explained:"Well he destroyed one of Winter's guards and mocked her. On top of that she was still hungry. She can be very short tempered sometimes."
