Weiss stood there, her legs shaking, moments from losing her friend. She knew Winter would consider her a failure for defending you. She had to decide what was more important for her. You or her sister acceptance.

And so Weiss made her decision:"Winter!" Her sister looked at her, seeing Weiss's confident expression. "Don't do this.":Weiss said. You could hear Yang banging on the door:"What's happening in there?! Is she eating him? I will cut her open, if she does." Winter would have been easily able to beat Yang in a fight, but she chose to release you. "Fine. If that is what you want. I just wanted to remind you that he only makes you soft. "

In the meantime you went to dry your arm with one of the towels, not even looking at Winter. "If this goes on like this, I want you to know Weiss, that I will not just stand there and watch as my own blood get's progessively weaker. ":Winter said as she stood up. "Shut up!":Weiss shouted. Winter was surprised at her sister reaction. She never spoke up to her that way. "You will leave him alone. In the short timespan we knew each each other, he showed me more love than our family ever did. He cared for me. I know you do too... And now you want to take him away from me?"

"I.. ":Winter began. "This has nothing to do with becoming weak or soft. Just because I'm in a relationship with him doesn't mean I stop eating boys. And no being in a relationship doesn't mean he is some sort of object to me that I will eventually eat if I grow bored of him. I love him. And he loves me too.":Weiss said. "Please Weiss, I...":Winter tried to explain. "Don't tell me you only care about my well being. I'm just fine as long as you leave him alone."

"So be it.":Winter said looking down:"I'm sorry for what I did to him." Weiss gave her an angry look:"Don't tell me this, say that to him." Winter was dumbfounded. Treating you like a human being? What was her sister expecting from her? "I'm waiting.":Weiss said. Winter bit her lip and faced your direction:"I-I'm sorry." Her apology was barely audible. "What was that? ":Weiss asked. "I'm sorry!":Winter said looking at you.

"Fine. Now thank him for changing you.":Weiss said, clearly amused about the power she had over her older sister. You could have sworn to hear Winter mumble something about if Weiss was serious about that. But she did what she was told:"Thank you for all... of your hard work. " Weiss smiled at her sister:"Wasn't even that hard, was it?" Winter looked completly embarrassed. "I will see you tomorrow.":she said and left the bathroom. On her way out she passed Yang, who gave her an angry look.

As Winter left the dorm, Yang asked:"What did she do?" Weiss, still smiling, replied:"She thanked him for his hard work." Yang looked at her, not believing what she had just heard:"...thanked him?" "I finally could convince her to accept him.":Weiss said happily. Never once did she tell Yang about what Winter had attempted to do to you. It wasn't relevant, it would only make Yang angry again. And right now she had to focus on the fight tomorrow.
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: Winter doesn't eat you because of Weiss

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
Yang and you were on your way to the arena. Looking over to the entrance, you could hear the booming sounds of the audience. This was your first fight in front of an audience, so naturally you were quite nervous. Yang gave you a smile:"Ready to give them a good show?"

"I guess so.":You replied, looking down. "Hey, what's wrong.":Yang asked as she put her hand on your shoulder. "It's just that I never did something like this.":You said. "You mean participating in a tournament? Neither did I. ":Yang said. You looked into her eyes. She showed no sign of being nervous.

"How can you not be nervous?":You asked. Yang put her hand on her chin:" I don't know what will await me in there. And I don't know if we will win. But that's what excites me the most about this. And besides you shouldn't be the one being nervous here. Just think of all the things you went through... " Yang stopped as she noticed what she just said.

"I'm sorry. I reminded you of it. ":she apologized. "It's ok. You were the one trying to rescue me from her.":you said. The marks of what Neo did to you were still there. They would always remind you of all the torture you went through. But they were also a symbol of your will. No matter how much she had tortured you, you still believed in your teammates rescuing you. And in the end you survived.

"You are thinking about it, aren't you? ":Yang said. You nodded:"You are right. I shouldn't be afraid of a tournament. This should be easy compared to what came before. This time I'm not fighting alone. I have you. And together we won't lose, no matter who our opponent is." You held your fist into her direction. She gave you a fist bump:"Yeah. Nobody will stop us."

Walking over to the middle of the arena, you had your first glimpse of your opponents on the screen. The pictures of Flynt Coal, a young man wearing a fedora and sunglasses and Neon Katt, a girl with red hair and pigtails were looking back at you. You turned to Yang and gave her a thumbs up. Your opponents didn't look that strong. You should be able to beat them.

Then, without a warning, a rainbow went right beside you, almost hitting you and came to a stop on the other side of the arena platform. The rainbow revealed itself as Neon Katt. And now that you could see more than just the picture of her face, you noticed that she had a tail. She was a faunus. You couldn't see her weapon. Was she fighting without one? Or were her rollerblades her weapon? No they weren't. Right in this moment she pulled two glowsticks from her belt. Wait... what? Acompaning her was your other opponent Flynt who was holding a...a trumpet? These guys's choice of weapons was strange.

"Can you even use those? You look like a farmers boy without experience.":mocked Flynt. You looked down at your revolvers. "Oh believe me, Saw and Loon never let me down.":you countered. "Oh really. Good luck hitting us with them. You won't have a chance.":Flynt said. Yang was starting to get aggrevated:"Hey why don't you... " But Neon interrupted her:"Hey why don't you. That's what you sound like."

Yang was a bit lost for words:"Uh... " But Neon continued:"Hey! Is that your boyfriend or did you drag your meal into a fight?" Yang looked over to you:"He is my boyfriend." Neon laughed:"Oh is he? I bet he was just afraid that you might eat him, so he didn't want to upset you. I mean look at you. You look like you would eat every boy you come across. You know what? You should try rollerblading sometime! It's super fun! It'd probably take you a while, though, since you're so... you know, top-heavy. But atleast you body's proportions would fit better. "

Yang looked down at herself:"Excuse me!?" But before Yang could start to defend herself the arena started to change. Four areas were picked by the random generator. A volcanic area, a sandy desert, a geysir field and an abandoned city. You looked around yourself to find an area where you would have the upper hand against your opponents. Then you heard Port counting down:"3.." You aswell as the others went into your fighting position. "2..." You gave Yang a look. "1..."

And without a warning Flynt used his trumpet to push you and Yang back aswell as Neon forward. The faunus girl went straight for Yang, while you focused on Flynt. Each of your revolvers had 6 bullets, after that you would have to reload them, which would make you vulnerable. You had the advantage here, since you could react faster than he could.

Meanwhile you could hear Oobleck and Port commenting the fight. "Today we finally get to see team Rwby(?)'s fifth member (Name). He had a rough start at beacon. Being put into an all girls team can be quite... stressful to say the least. But he proved himself to be worthy and is now standing here in front of us in the arena.":Port said. "Yes Mr.(Name) is probably team Rwby(?) biggest trump card. Almost no one has seen him fight yet, so he has the upper hand in this battle. ":Oobleck added.

This of course gave you a huge boost in your self-esteem. You were team Rwby(?)'s biggest trump card. This sentence alone made you want to surpass your limits. Flynt however wasn't just standing around in front of you. He used the time you were distracted for an attack. You reacted just fast enough to dodge his trumpet. This reminded you to focus on what was happening in front of you.

Flynt was able to blow you away with his trumpet, but could he dodge your bullets? Could he react as fast as you could? You doubted it. What you needed was a distraction for him. And you knew just what to do. Running directly into his direction you tried to get him to attack. And so he did. Easily dodging his attack because of your semblence you attacked him from the side, shooting six bullets out of one of your revolvers. Every single one hit it's target, before Flynt could even react.

Seeing his aura depleet on the screen, you knew he was out. "Mr.Coal is out of the match. Mr.(Name)'s remarkable reflexes are just too powerful for him. This leaves team FNKI with only one combatant. ":Oobleck said. Looking over to Yang, you saw she was having trouble fighting Neon. The cat faunus was just too fast for her. But as soon as Neon noticed that you beat Flynt, she turned her attention to you.

Now rollerskating into your direction, she readied her glowsticks. "You are going to pay for that, you little snack.":she shouted, getting faster. Neon wasn't aware that you had no problem aiming at her. She was skating right into your trap. Behind her you could see Yang charging at her. This should be the finishing blow. You only needed to use the right timeframe.
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: Skip to the fight

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
Then right before Neon was in front of you, you jumped against her, kicking her away and shot with your other revolver at her, while you were still in the air. This knocked her into the direction of Yang who delivered the finishing blow and punched Neon into a house in the abandoned city area.

The colosseum boomed. "And with that team Rwby(?) is victorious. ":Port said. Yang walked over to you, hugging you tightly: "You were awesome." You returned her compliment:"I had a good teacher." Yang gave you a kiss on the lips. A loud "aww" could be heard from the audience. "Don't be like that now. You did that all by yourself.":Yang said. You knew she didn't want you to share this accomplishment with her, to make you feel stronger.

She knew that you were thinking that you were the weakest member of team Rwby(?) because of everything that had happened and she wanted to change that. But something else was grabbing your attention. A smell that was completly ruining this moment. Putting your hands on Yang's padded buttcheeks, you knew what had happened. "You thought that now was the approprirate time for something like this? "

"Sorry. I had to go since this match started. I was kinda distracted with fighting and I guess my body thought that now was the perfect time to... loose waste. ":Yang said, giving you a nervous laugh. "Let's go and get you changed. ";You said before you were stopped by Neon:"You guys were... amazing. I would have never thought that this guy was more than just a snack. " She points at you and comes closer:"We should hang out sometime. Maybe eat something together. " Neon pauses as a trickling sound could be heard. "Oh my gosh. I needed to pee so bad. Probably shouldn't have drank so much soda before the fight."

"I correct myself, you do have skill.":Flynt said, escorting Neon out of the arena. Looking after them, you could imagine how troublesome it had to be changing Neon because of her hyperactiveness. "(Name)! Yang!":Ruby was shouting as she and the rest of team RWBY came to celebrate the victory. "You two did a great job.":Ruby said, joining your hug. "I agree.":Weiss said as she also put her arms around you. Blake stood there looking like she needed approval before she could join the group hug. "Are you coming too, Blake?":Yang asked, leading the cat faunus to join you too.

Now, being squeezed between the four girls, you finally felt as though you weren't just their weakest member. You were on the same level. This moment could go on forever and you wouldn't care. It was that good. But of course it didn't, because Ruby noticed what you had noticed before, leading her to break the hug:"Ugh Yang, you stink." Weiss immediately let go of you and distanced herself from Yang. "I was holding that in for a long time, ok? ":Yang said as she followed Ruby out of the colosseum.

Only Blake was still there, hugging you. Didn't she notice that her teammates already broke the hug? Or was she liking this too much to let go? Maybe she wanted to repay you everything she thought she owed to you. You knew that she was thinking that it was her fault you were captured back then. Since you were back, Blake was avoiding every conversation with you. You got her to interact with you for a bit back then when you came back but what had happened that day, led her to distance herself from you, yet again.

"Can the rest of team RWBY please leave the arena, so we can start the next fight?":you heard Port say through the speakers. Blake's eyes shot open as she noticed that she was the only one still hugging you. Her face as red as it could be, she broke the hug and went to leave the colosseum. She may distances herself from you, but in truth she really wanted to be around you, you could feel it. Following her, you left the colosseum.

Back at your dorm room, Yang, Ruby and Weiss were already discussing who should compete in the 1 vs. 1 round. Yang was insisting on doing it but Weiss wanted you to compete since you impressed her that much in your last fight. Ruby occassionally threw in some short sentences why it would be better to pick either you or Yang. She couldn't decide however who she was going to pick.

As you entered the room with Blake, Weiss immediately put you inbetween Yang and herself:"He should represent us after what he did today." Yang shook her head:"No. I too think he was great but I don't want to stress him and besides if it comes to power I best him easily. One good hit from me is stronger than his revolvers." She wasn't wrong. Given the circumstances, Yang could easily beat her opponents if she could place a good hit. But the "if" was important here. Her accurancy wasn't as good as yours. You could react faster and more precise than her, leading your bullets to never miss their target.

Weiss was of course not done with defending you:" Did you see his aim? He was the top damage dealer in the last round, so it makes only sense to use him again." Yang wanted to open her mouth to disagree as Ruby came up with an idea:"If you two can't decide who we are going to pick we should put it to a vote. " The two girls agreed.
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: You beat her

1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
You kinda didn't want to fight another round if Yang was insisting to do it. If that was what she wanted then you were happy if she got the chance to do it. So it was no surprise that you yourself raised your hand as Ruby asked who would vote for Yang. Weiss was of course not really happy about that decision. She was the only one who voted for you. But she also didn't want to disrespect your opinion. So she chose to stay silent.

"So it's settled then. Yang will fight in the next round. ":Ruby said:"But until then we have some free time, so what do you want to do? " Blake was already sitting in her bed, reading one of her books as Ruby asked the question. Yang was still standing there in her messed diaper. Weiss was already clinging to your arm, wanting to praise you for your good match. And you stood there, a bit tired from the fight.
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: They pick Yang

choices: Do something with one of your teammates
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
Weiss was already clinging to you and you didn't want to shake her off. It would only make her feel like you don't care about her. Your decision to not compete in the next round was already a small let down for her. She was proud of you for winning and wanted you to go even further. Maybe it was because of her sister. Winter should see what Weiss's boyfriend was capable of.

You could feel Weiss pulling on your arm. She was trying to pull you away from the others. If that was what she wanted, you would obey her. Following her out of the room, the two of you went outside. Going back to the same bench you were sitting on, just a few days ago. You sat down beside her. Laying her head on your shoulder, she said:"You were great today."

"Thank you. I hope it doesn't bother you that much that I chose to not compete in the next round.":you said. Weiss looked to your face:"I'm sure you would have won but if you don't want to... " She layed her head back on your shoulder. "So what did you want to talk about with me?":you asked. Weiss sighed:"It's Winter. Remember when she said she wanted to talk to me the next day? Well the conversation didn't went so well."

You looked at Weiss:"What do you mean?" Weiss thought for a bit, trying to form the next sentence in her head:"She said she would only really accept you as my boyfriend if you would win the tournament." You looked at her, not seeing her problem:"Why do you care?" Weiss looked to the ground:"Because I don't want to constantly fear that you will be eaten by her. You know how she is. She only sees a lesser being in you. Nothing more than food. And if I'm not around, she will probably use the chance. "

"I thought she wouldn't try to do that to me anymore.":you said. "I thought so too. But Winter is stubborn. I tried to reason with her but she didn't want to listen. Next time she visits us, I will constantly watch everything she does. But that could take some time. She already left Vale. ":Weiss said. Atleast you didn't have to watch out for her now. "Next time she visits us, I will try to use my charm on her. It worked on you. So why wouldn't it... " You stopped as you felt Weiss fist hitting you in the stomach:"You will not try to seduce my sister!"

You looked over to Weiss. She gave you an angry look and her cheeks were crimson red:"You are mine. Not her's. I will not let her take you away from me." Did Weiss just call you her property? "Why is that a problem? You had no problem with sharing me with Ruby and Yang. And besides, it's not like I want to start a relationship with her. I just want to see if that would change her opinion about me. "

Weiss folded her arms and looked into the opposite direction:"Your plan will end with you in her diaper. She always eats the boys that try to seduce her. She doesn't even care about them. You will make no diffrence. So don't even try it. I know what I'm talking about. " You had missinterpreted her sentence. Her problem wasn't that she would have to share you. Her problem was that Winter wouldn't care about what you would say.

Seeing that Weiss would probably know more about Winter than you, you gave her a hug:"Then I will let you protect me. " Weiss turned around, returning the hug:"That's better." And so you sat there for another hour disccusing the fight before returning to your dorm room.

Do you want to skip to Yang's fight or do you want to do something with one of the other members of team RWBY(?)
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: Spend time with Weiss

choices: Get Blake to open up to you
Just sleep and go to the next fight
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content: Or maybe you want to do this instead.
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: Something else

choices: Go to the fairgrounds and eat something with Blake
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
What Blake did after your fight had peeked your interest in her. Normally she didn't really show any interest in you, usually trying to avoid you at any cost because of the guilt she felt for letting you get caught. But back then in the colosseum, when she hugged you, you felt something. She didn't break the hug when the others did. She was enjoying it. She wanted your love but she wasn't sure if she earned it.

If your expectations were true, Weiss would have to wait. You had to get Blake to finally feel positive. And there was only one way to do it. Be alone with her. The last time maybe went a bit wrong. You weren't ready for the situation then. Who would've known that she had just recently ate a boy? This time you would do a better job. You would comfort her more. Tell her that you forgive her. Maybe even let her relax a bit.

It just had to go right this time, if you wanted her to finally come out of her "black hole" and look you in the eyes. The potential was there, you just had to kickstart her spirit again. "We'll talk later Weiss. I know this is important for you but I have to clear things up once and for all. ":You said. Weiss understood, albeit looking a bit hurt to be pushed out of your way.

Going over to Blake, she was already sitting in her bed again with one of her books, trying to avoid any attention. But this time her tactic wouldn't work. You wouldn't just let her do this to herself anymore. Choosing your approach to this situation in your head, you came closer and closer. You knew that she saw you, since she began to hide her face in her book. That wouldn't stop you.

As you stood beside her, there was only one thing left to do. Showing her that you take interest in her should warm her up a bit. Sitting down beside her, you tried to get as close to her as possible. She tried to not react at all. Was this too much? No it was right what she wanted you to do. Now that you sat beside her, you could feel her heartbeat. You could feel how she tried to calm herself down as the speed of her heartbeat decreased.

The other girls were still in the room and watched as you tried to get Blake to open up. Ruby and Yang silently cheered for you, while Weiss stood there with her arms crossed. Well you did just left her standing there to care for someone else, while she wanted to be taken care of. But you know she understood why this was important. Looking back to Blake you noticed that she wasn't turning to the next page in her book. She was either reading very slow or she was waiting for you to do something.

You leaned to the latter option. Looking to the spot where she was looking, you noticed that her eyes didn't move. It seemed like she was frozen in place. She was really waiting for you to say something. To break the silence. "Blake? I think we should have some time alone, don't you think?":you asked. You saw a slight hint of red on her cheeks, her mouth formed to a small missable smile as you felt her heartbeat excelerate. She had waited for this moment.

But... she didn't answer your question. She just sat there, her eyes still focusing on her book. You thought for a bit. She was obviously liking the fact that you were close to her right now, considering her reaction. Was it her guilt that was holding her back again? "I think we should stop thinking about what happened in our past and move on. If we let the past control us, we will never reach our goals.":you put your hand on her shoulder, she shuddered a bit:"Do you think I can't see that you want to bury that memory and start moving forward again? You want to forget what happened. You want to forgive yourself. I never made you responsible for what happened. What's holding you back is you."

She shook a bit. Her eyes seemed to glimmer. The tears would soon start to fall. Knowing what would happen, you put her book away. "C'mon Blake where is the point in this? I'm not letting you do this to yourself. We don't want you to do this to yourself. If you feel bad, we will feel bad too.... You know, I felt something back then in the colosseum. That Blake that hugged me, it was a Blake that didn't want to have these feelings anymore. She forgave herself for a minute and did what she wanted to do. She didn't hold herself back because a voice in the back of her head said she should... I know you can get to the point where you are that Blake again. You just have to....":You had no chance to finish the sentence as Blake wrapped both of her arms around your neck and hugged you.

And then the tears came. "I'm sorry.":Blake almost whispered. "Don't be.":you said as you returned her hug:"There is nothing you have to be sorry about." You could hear Yang talk to Ruby in the background:" I knew he could do it." But there was only one thing in your mind now. Spend some time alone with Blake. But where?
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.title: Get Blake to open up to you

choices: Blake has to use her diaper
1213333331111122111112111122221111111122.content:
Eating something together with Blake would surely make her talk. And talking to each other was very important now. She not only had to feel comfortable around you, she also had to know that she could speak with you if she needed you for something. But most importantly Blake had to feel good while doing so.

The idea seemed good in your head. You just had to find a place. Doing it here with the rest of team RWBY would only lead to Blake being silent again since the others would be talking and she probably wouldn't start a conversation with you. Maybe you two should go back to the fairgrounds and eat something there? That one stand seemed nice and you remembered that Blake really enjoyed the food there.

But first you had to wait for her to calm down and wipe her tears away. You could imagine that she wouldn't like to go outside, looking like this. People would look at her. And Blake should only notice you giving her attention for now. As she laid there in your arms, you couldn't help but smile. It wasn't usual for her to do something like this and you had to savour every second of it.

Once her tears had dried away, you patted her back."Do you feel better now?":you asked the faunus girl. "Yes.":Blake responded. "Then how about we go out and eat something together? Just you and me. ":you asked. Blake thought for a moment before giving you a "yes." again. Good. She was willing to come with you. Slowly she got down from your body and let you stand up. "Where are we going?":Blake asked you.
"Oh. I know just the place.":you responded.

--20 minutes later--

Blake was walking beside you as you reached the stand at the fairgrounds. You knew what she was going to order before she could even open her mouth. As the shopkeep came back with two bowls of noodles (one with fish and one without fish) in his hands, Blake was pulling her purse out of her pocket. You simply motioned her not to. You would pay for her order too, although you didn't have that much money.

You wanted this moment to be entirely for Blake. She should just relax and let the things happen. Blake was looking a bit lost though as the bowl was standing in front of her. You knew she would happily eat the meal but something was holding her back. "It's ok. Once we win this tournament I'll have more than enough lien to balance out these two meals.":you assured her.

Next thing you knew was that she was hugging you for a few seconds saying:"thank you." before immediately getting red faced and going back to her former position. She seemed to think for a moment before you could see her eyes track to the bowl of fish and noodles in front of her. Now would be a good time to talk to her. But right as you opened your mouth, Blake's face was already in the bowl. You should have known that that would happen.

Who could blame her? You just gave her something to eat after a long day in which she probably didn't even eat that much. And judging how fast she was swallowing her food, she must've been pretty hungry. Well as long as she was happy, you would be too. So you started to eat your own noodles.

--After you finished eating the noodles--

Blake was holding her stomach as it began to digest what she ate. She seemed very calm and relaxed now. "Did you enjoy your food?":you asked. "Yes...":Blake said before she held a hand in front of her mouth to keep herself from burping:"Excuse me." She now looked directly into your eyes as if she was expecting something. You looked back into hers, as you felt yourself being drawn to her. At the same time she was also coming closer to you.

You slowly put your arms around her, like it was an instinct, as she began to do the same. Then she kissed you. You could taste the flavour of fish on her lips, you felt how her heartbeat increased. Blake was happy, very happy that you did this for her. This hug/kiss went on for a few minutes before Blake broke it.

You realized that you didn't have to talk to her again to get her to open up to you. Right now you finally broke the barrier that was holding Blake back. But like the last time, Blake was getting tired again. "Should I carry you back to our dorm room again?":you asked. "No. It's fine. I can walk. I'm just... tired. You already did enough for me today. ":Blake responded. But you insisted on it. "Oh c'mon. It's no problem for me. I can use the training.":you said as you showed her your back.

"I'm not doing that.":Blake said. "But... you already did, remember?":you said:"Sure, back then you were asleep. You didn't choose to do it but I didn't you hear you complain about it afterwards. Just enjoy yourself, ok?" Blake gave you an unsure look:"I can't enjoy myself if someone else has to suffer for it." That sentence triggered something inside of you. Did she really just say that? You felt yourself getting angry but tried your best to hold it back.

You wanted to shout at her for that. Was she missing the fact that she as a girl constantly enjoyed herself on the count of others. Did she completly forget that she ate, digested and killed numerous boys just to satisfy her hunger? Sure, for her it was normal. She was never in the position of having to constantly fear for her life because it could end any minute.

She must've noticed your reaction to her sentence when she began to apologize:"I'm sorry. It slipped out. I didn't think this through." You knew that Blake would start to blame herself again if you wouldn't stop her now. She would revert back to her silent state, in which she wouldn't talk to you. Of course you didn't want this to happen, but at the same time you couldn't forgive her for a sentence like this. It didn't seem right to just ignore what she just said. After all, she not only offended you with it, she also disrespected everyone that had fallen victim to her.

But she knew that it was a mistake. She knew that she did something wrong. Wasn't that enough for you to forget that mistake and forgive her? Could you just look past that, just to make her feel comfortable with herself? It just seemed so wrong. If you would forgive her it would basically mean that all the people she killed were essentially worth nothing to you. And that was surely not right. After all you could have been one of them.

The whole reason that you were alive now was that the members of team RWBY(?) took a liking to you. And of course you were thankful that they treated you like one of their own. Normally if you wanted to survive in this world you had to put the things you value under the things the girls valued. This wasn't the case here. They respected your oppinions. They cared for your feelings. They protected you. Would they do the same if you weren't one of them?

Was it really worth it to look past all the people whose life, Blake ended, just to make one girl feel good? No this world was always like this. The girls never thought about what they did and what problems they were causing with it. It was normal to them, so it had to be normal for you. Atleast Blake was apologizing. Something most girls would never do.

So although you wanted to scream at her, you knew it wouldn't change anything, other than to make Blake feel bad for something she couldn't change. "Get on my back Blake.":you said, trying to sound as nice as possible. Which was very hard after what just happened. Blake was a bit surprised at your reaction. "But... I... ":she said. "No buts. Hearing a voice getting closer, the young girl looked at you and then back from where she came from:"I suppose you are lucky. If I wasn't on the run, you would have been gone by now. Bye." She then ran away as fast as she could. What exactly did she mean by that though? Was she talking about killing you? Why? What did you do to her? The voice came closer and closer until it's owner was directly behind you. Looking at her, you saw a beautiful young woman who looked a bit exhausted.

Was she chasing after this girl? What had she done? The young woman looked at you and...
121333333312.title: You are the protagonist

12133333333.title: More Anime 8

121333333331.content: So first up, are you a student or already a pro-hero? Or are you perhaps...?
121333333331.title: My hero academia

1213333333311.content:
It was always your dream to become a hero. Saving people, fighting villains, doing good things. But in order to that, you first had to finish school. And not just any school. U.A. Highschool where the best of the best graduated from. Honestly you were surprised you even got this far, considering that your quirk wasn't that spectacular. Ok, maybe you didn't give it enough credit. It was quite useful after all, if you used it right. You were able to paralyze your opponents by licking them.

At first this sounds really disgusting and...It is. Just imagine having a really gross villain in front of you and the only thing you can do is lock him. Yeah, there were better quirks out there but this was the one you got. Could have been worse. Having no quirk for example. Well anyway, there you were in the middle of class 1A. Ok not in the middle, you sat there against a wall in the left corner at the back of the room. In a corner? Yes in a corner. You kinda ran into trouble after entering the room.

First we have to give a quick explanation of what sort of trouble you were in. One would think that heroes would always try to make the world a better place by working together. Not so the female heroes. Atleast not in the sense of actually working together physically. More like...working as one...Or in other words, eating their male counterparts and getting a powerboost from doing so. One would think that this would go against the laws and make those who did so villains but no this wasn't the case.

The government actually approved of this as it would increase the strength of those heroines. The only downside of this ability? Being completly incontinent, rendering every heroine diaper dependent. But this was a downside they could simply overlook considering that they could become far stronger than their male counterparts by eating them. Which would happen especially in their current agegroup. Most of them would eat their first boy in this time and unfortunately you found yourself at the mercy of three particular girls that all decided that you should be their first meal.

Standing in front of you were Tsuyu Asui, Mina Ashido and Toru Hagakure. All of them wearing their uniforms, which did a bad job at covering their diapers, which just simply poked out under their skirts. "I'm the one who got here first. That means he's mine.":Toru said. "I already wanted to eat him before you got here.":Mina said.

The girls were so focused on debating who would get to eat you that they completly forgot that you were a human being. A human being that maybe wasn't so keen on getting eaten on his first day. Seeing that nobody even tried to help you was also pretty discouraging. That was when Tsuyu made a suggestion:"Why don't we let him decide who gets to eat him? I mean it's only fair, right?" Well atleast someone saw you as human enough to give you a choice. But you were still kind of a meal inside Tsuyu's eyes. A meal with a choice. The truth is not all girls their age were focused on eating their male counterparts.

Many of them were unsure of what would happen. They were scared that they were suddenly allowed to eat those who they considered human, maybe even friends a few days ago. Some didn't even try it out in the first place and protected those they liked. But they knew it would become part of their daily life soon. That Tsuyu was willing to give you a choice showed you that she didn't quite make up her mind yet. Sure she saw you as a meal. But there was a chance. A chance you could use to get out of here. Alive.

You looked at the froggirl, thankfulness in your eyes. You weren't sure if she interpreted it this way though. Hopefully she did. There was a small smile on her face after all. "I think he likes that idea.":Tsuyu said. Mina just shrugged:"Well, be sure to pick me. I want to be strong so that I can be a great hero in the future." Toru made some gestures that you couldn't see. She is invisible after all:"Don't pick them. Pick me. Don't you want to become part of me? After all I'm the most beautiful girl in this class."

That sentence earned her confused looks from her two classmates. "I just want to help others and would be happy if you would pick me. I think you would help me get very far.":Tsuyu said. Out of all of them Tsuyu was able to put her sentence in a way that it wasn't sounding as bad as the others, but well it was still kinda bad for you. You got that they had to eat someone to become stronger but why did it have to be you. Anyway, you couldn't sit here forever you had to pick someone and pray that you would get out of here alive. Maybe they wouldn't eat you if you would tell them why you would pick them. Maybe...
1213333333311.title: I'm a student

choices: One of the other girls eats you
12133333333111.content:
Actually on second thought, maybe Tsuyu wasn't the best idea. You weren't quite sure about her. Of course she was being very nice when she gave you the option to choose but...well something wasn't quite right. Wasn't this just a trick to lure you in? She has a frog quirk after all, so it wouldn't surprise you if she also acted a bit like one. Frogs would wait till their prey would feel safe and then snatch them up woth their long tongues. What if Tsuyu just wanted to give you a false sense of safety?

She is smart. She could easily do that. Maybe the other girls would be a better option here. But which one should you pick? Toru? No, how could you trust a person if you couldn't even see their expression? Mina perhaps? Well she seemed a bit more trustworthy. Something about her made you think that she would spare you if you would just talk her out of it. And if that fails...well her acid will break you down quickly, so you won't suffer for long. Think. Just think. If you would really pick her you have to have a good reason as to why she should spare you. A "I don't want to die." won't work.

The old "false love" trick could work. Just telling her that you love her and would do everything for her. Well...everything meant being eaten by her aswell so...you know how this could end. Maybe you use your quirk to paralyze her. No that won't change anything. The next day the girls will just wait for you here again. But this time angry. Which would definetly destroy all your chances. There had to be a way out of this.

The best way out of this would be to get Mina to protect you. That way you wouldn't have to worry about other girls anymore. She would just be there for you, like a bodyguard. But is that even realistic? Why should she do that? There was no reason. She wouldn't gain anything out of this. Everything she cared for was eating you. And she probably wouldn't even waste a thought on what would happen to you once that's done. But you didn't want it to end right here.

This should be your chance to become a great hero. You shouldn't be stopped before even taking one step. Why did these three choose you? Why did they want to take your future right out of your hands and smash it? They smiled at you (Atleast Mina and Tsuyu did) even though they were planning to do these cruel things to you, like it was normal. And the sad thing was, it really was. They didn't take a moment to think about what you would think about all of this. Why should they? You didn't have anything to say in this matter. You were food.

And yet they made you decide who would be the person who would bring about your end. Tsuyu's suggestion sounded way more cruel now that you thought about it. No matter who you would pick it would end the same. But Mina...she could...no she wouldn't...no one would... You just have to convince her. She could be your guardian. She wouldn't do that. She would. No she wouldn't. She would eat you immediately. But there had to be a chance. Somehow you had to convince her.

Maybe doing something she likes? What does she like? She never told you that. Why would she even do that? You never talked to each other until now. Maybe it was better to pick Tsuyu instead. No, you just decided to pick Mina. Don't just change your decision, stay with what you decided. "Hurry up already. I'm hungry.":Toru said. That's right. You couldn't just stand here forever, thinking about all of this. You just had to act now, put everything you got in it and convince her.

You went down on your knees and looked at Mina, as your eyes met. Doing your best impression of a casanova you held an invisible rose in your hand:"Please Ashido. Let me be yours. Not as your meal but as your friend. I want to see you smile every day from now on. I want to be the reason you smile. I want to be the one that makes you happy, the person you can rely on. A sidekick in a way. Please spare me and I'll make sure that your life will always be happy. Please just give me this chance. M-my princess."

Not bad for an improvisation but how would she take it? You still held the invisible rose up to her, as she looked at you, surprised. How would she react? Would she give you this chance? Or would she just eat you?
12133333333111.title: You chose Mina

choices: Nothing happens during the rest of the day. You meet up with Mina
121333333331111.content:
Mina gave you a surprised look, before quickly blushing and avoiding your eye-contact. She couldn't quite hide a small smile forming on her face. But not only she was affected by your proposal, you heard how Tsuyu couldn't hold back a "cute" and Toru was stuck somewhere between being disappointed that you didn't pick her and cheering you on for your move. If you'd take a moment to look at these three, you would quickly notice that they were still just girls behind their alarming eating habits.

You waited patiently for her answer. Since all of this came relatively out of the blue for her, it was only natural that she would take a moment or two to process all of this. She had probably thought that one of them would have eaten you by now and that would be it, not that you would compliment her. Slowly she looked back at you, as you knelt in front of her, the invisible rose still in your hands. She went over to grab it but...grabbed your hand instead. Lifting you to her level, she looked you deep in the eyes.

There was no indication of what she might be thinking about right now. There were just the two of you, looking at each other. As if everything else was silent right now, the only thing you could hear was her voice echoing through your ears:"You just did. You made me smile." You almost let out a sigh of relieve but stopped yourself, considering what implication you would send to her with that gesture. "I think...I like you. Would you...like to...meet me after school? Maybe at the entrance? We could walk to my house together and...well...I would like to know you a bit more.":She said.

She wants to know you a little bit better? Ok that was a chance you couldn't just ignore. You had to strengthen this bond between her and you as soon as possible if you wanted to survive. "Of course I would.":You replied, maybe a little bit too fast. But Mina just gave you another smile:"I can't wait." And with that she left you standing there with Tsuyu and Toru. Wait...Tsuyu and Toru were still there?

Oh no this is bad. Nothing was stopping them from eating you now. Since Mina just left, this was only between these two now. Why did she leave? This wasn't supposed to happen. She should've protected you now. Tsuyu looked at Toru and then back at you. You assumed Toru did the same. What was going to happen now? Would they debate again? Or would they just let whoever's faster eat you? But then...without a word...they both left you. What? Didn't they say they wanted to eat you?

Did you overlook something? They wouldn't just leave someone like you, technically a free meal, standing there. No girl would. Wait...there was something you overlooked. Yeah right, you choose Mina to eat you...but she didn't...which means...well...you didn't know what that means. One thing was sure, they let you go. And that was good. Now you just had to get this day of school done and you could get yourself a bodyguard.
121333333331111.title: She gives you a chance

12233111.content:
Timmy Turner was having an awful day! First his mom embarrassed him about being uncivilized about a few things he does. Next he was bullied by the love of his life, Trixie Tang about being more mature. The day got even worse when he got home..... His parents left him with the horrible babysitter Vicky! Vicky tortured him as usual and making Timmy's mood drop even more. After reaching his room, Timmy thought the nightmare was over.... Only for Wanda to try and lecture him about being responsible!

"That's it!" Timmy yelled to his Fairy Godparents. "I'm sick of the lectures! I'm sick of being called uncivilized! I'm sick of being called in mature! I wish all the girls would just become the very thing they don't want me to be!" Timmy finished yelling.

Cosmo and Wanda looked at each other and then waved their wands in the air. After a ding and a poof of spoke disappeared, Timmy looked at his Godparents. "Did it work?" Timmy asked. Both the fairies looked at him with a shrug. "We don't know yet sport." Wanda answered. Timmy just gave a sigh as he plopped onto the bed. "Maybe the girls are right......" Timmy said before falling asleep.

Unknown to Timmy. The wish did work..... But not in a way he expected....

Timmy looked at both of them for a second before noticing something off about Wanda.

"Uh.. Wanda?" Timmy said grabbing her attention. "Yes sport?" Timmy's eyes lowered to her pants. "Why are your pants bulging out?" Timmy asked. "Oh this?" Wanda said as she grabbed the waist of her pants to reveal a diaper. "It's just a diaper." Tommy was still confused.
"Why are you wearing one?" Wanda just gave him a shrug. "That's not important dear." Wanda said trying to avoid the subject.

Timmy came to a conclusion that it was probably something between Cosmo and Wanda. Strangely enough Cosmo hasn't said anything so far.... Timmy looked at Cosmo who was squeezing a rubber duck.

"That explains having no input...." Timmy thought. Timmy headed out his bedroom door, but before hearing Wanda say. "We'll be right there with you soon... I just have to take care of something....." Wanda said licking her lips, as she faced Cosmo who was still occupied by the rubber ducky. "Rub dub dub! My rubber ducky likes the tub!" Was the last thing Timmy heard as he left his room.

12322121111.content: You start to walk towards Peach's Castle. It was a nice walk. When you get there, you find a large table of snacks, music, people dancing. The girls were completely naked except for their diapers.
12322121111.title: Time to leave to go to the Party

choices: You agree to play the game
You give up and one of the girls eats you
123221211112.content:
It was a bit weird to see that the girls didn't even try to conceal their diapers. In this world it surely wasn't strange to see a girl wearing diapers but those who were in higher positions, such as princesses (or in Pauline's case mayors), normally didn't just show their diapers out in the open. It was seen as immature. Then again, no one would stop them if they wanted too. And if someone tried to...well you wouldn't hear from them anytime soon. But still, there had to be a reason behind this.

Then suddenly the music stopped as Peach went onto a stage in the back of the room. She smiled and waved to the guests. "Thank you all for coming. This Party wouldn't be as much fun without you. Infact it wouldn't be fun at all.":Peach said, as you couldn't stop but feel flattered. "We invited only the best residents of the mushroom kingdom to this party, those who we deemed fitting...":Peach went on for the next 15 minutes about how good you all were before Rosalina reminded her of something.

"Uh. Right I almost forgot. Now that we all danced and ate alot, how about we play a game?":Peach asked as the other guests all agreed. You however wondered what kind of game she wanted to play. You looked over to the three other girls who all silently whispered something to each other. Something was...off here. "I suppose all of you wanted to try this atleast one time in your life. Well now you can. We are going to play Mario Party.":Peach said, her voice full of excitement.

Mario Party? Well not surprising given the lack of actual games in the mushroom kingdom. There was the usual big sport event here and there but other than that there was only Mario Party. A game that was mostly played by those with a higher rank than the average mushroom kingdom inhabitant. Of course you always wanted to play this game, but this weird feeling didn't disappear. Something just didn't feel right. Something told you to run.

It only took Peach's next words for you to understand why:"We did change the rules a bit to make the game more fun. Every single round one of us will eat the Player with the lowest score until there is only one of you left. So give everything you got if you don't want to end up in our diapers. But don't worry if you get eaten though, that way you don't have to change us afterwards. Uh...I almost forgot, there are no Bowser spaces. Instead of Bowser we will appear and you get eaten." You were right to think something was foul here. Turning around to leave the room, the door quickly slammed in front if you.

"Ah ah ah, we won't let you leave unless you all play this game. Trust me it will be fun. Unless of course some of you already give up. We would be happy to eat you on the spot.":Peach said, laughing. The other girls did the same. You had no choice you had to play this game if you didn't want to end up as a mess in one of their diapers. But the chances to win here weren't that high considering that your competition was exactly no one. Far from it. There were atleast 40 other people in this room. So maybe you should give up now instead of fighting an unnecessairy fight.
123221211112.title: You start to feel uneasy

12331.title: Life is strange

123311.content: It was a normal day at blackwell academy. Atleast you thought it would be a normal one.You were sitting outside the school and watched the sky. Suddenly someone walked into your view. It was Victoria Chase. You didn't have any clue what she wanted from you. But you could clearly sense that something wasn't right. She looked like she had trouble walking. She obviously had something under her skirt. "Can you do me a favor? ":she said looking at you. "What favor? ":you responded. "Stay still. ":she said. You did what she asked you to do. It was probably for a photo. To your surprise she didn't use her camera. Her stomach grumbled. She looked at her stomach then back to you. "Ready to be my dinner. " You couldn't even think about what she just said as she began grabbing you.
123311.title: You are a student at Blackwell

choices: "The food isn't allowed to speak " She eats you
1233111.content: You shook her off and ran as fast as you could. Looking back you saw her waddle after you. She wasn't very fast. As you looked around you noticed other girls trying to eat boys. They all waddled like Victoria. It was like a horde of Zombies. But these Zombies were smarter. You couldn't see Victoria anymore. Looking back in front of you, you ran directly into a girl. As you fell you pulled her pants down. As you looked up to see in who you ran into you saw Max Caulfield looking down on you. She was wearing a thick diaper. So that's why the girls waddle. But why would the girls wear such things as diapers? It didn't make any sense. For a moment you forgot in how much danger you were. If the other Girls eat boys, Max would probably do it too. You began to beg for your life :"Please don't eat me Max."
1233111.title: You escape

choices: She let's you stay there alone
12331112.content: She looked very confused at you:" Why should I eat you? " Thinking she only wanted to trick you so that you were an easy prey, you shouted at her :" Because that's what the other girls did to the boys. They suddenly began eating boys and wore diapers. You probably want to do the same thing. " Max thought for a bit. Then she began to speak again:" Ok. First: I don't want to eat you. Second: I don't know why I wear this thing. " She pointed to her diaper. "And third: Don't ever pull my pants down again pervert. " She pulled her pants up again. "So that means you don't want to eat me? " "Yeah didn't you listen to what I said? Although I feel pretty hungry now that you mention it. " All the sounds attracted other girls in the meantime. You saw them waddle in your direction. "Please help me Max. I don't want to get eaten. "
12331112.title: She doesn't eat you

choices: She tells you about her time powers
She doesn't tell you about it
123311121.content: "Follow me if you don't want to get eaten. ":she says. "Was that a Terminator reference? ":you said while getting up again. She ran in the direction of the girls dorm and opened the door to her room. You entered her room and she closed it behind you. It was full of pictures. "Why did this happen? ":You ask her. "I don't know but I have a theory."
123311121.title: She helps you

choices: Max can't rewind the time back
1233111211.content:
"This might sound crazy but I can rewind time. And maybe I changed something in the past. ":she said.

"Considering what just happened nothing surprises me anymore. What did you change? ": You ask her.

"It's a little bit embarrasing to me but I am a secret ab/dl and I was just looking through pictures in the internet. The last thing I remember was that I touched this picture. "

She showed you a picture of a woman on a stage. The picture looked very old. The Woman was only dressed in a diaper. She had a boy in her mouth. At the bottom of the picture was a date. 28.09.1930

"Strange. Last time I looked at it, it was diffrent. Let's see what happened on that date. "

She typed the date into her internet search. The first page seemed to be about that picture.

Max read through the page :" 28.09.1930 was the day the women were first allowed to eat the males. Since then every girl and women are allowed to eat everyone. Because it was easier to use a diaper than to go to a toilet the females had to wear diapers. WTF? What have I done? I should rewind time again. "
1233111211.title: She tells you about her time powers

choices: You try to find Professor Kukui
12333313331.content: You were a new trainer in the Alola region. You just moved there yesterday. Professor Kukui already told you the rules of this region and they were floating through your head. You thought about how weird they were. "Rule nr.1: All girls have to wear diapers, Rule nr.2: If a girl wants to eat a boy she is allowed to do that without consequences..." These rules just sounded so dumb. As If a girl could just eat a boy. And even if they could, why would girls do that? Kukui could have just joked around but you soon noticed that he told you the truth. At the evening your mom entered your room. "Do you think this looks good?":she asked you pulling up her skirt to reveal a diaper. So Kukui was telling the truth. With an awkward expression on your face you answered :" umm....... yes... " You couldn't believe that your mom would follow that stupid rule. "Good I can't wait to eat someone. That was one of the reasons we moved. ":she said happy. She left your room and you were seriously scared. What if she would eat you. You didn't know if that would actually be possible but you didn't want to find out. You had to get out of here. You had to get to Professor Kukui. Maybe he could help you.
12333313331.title: Generation 7

123333133311.content: It would be smart to leave the house while you could. You didn't want to end up in your mother's belly. The bad thing was that you didn't know where professor Kukui lives. It shouldn't be far away from your house but it would be a big risk to go out since you didn't know in which direction you should go. You opened the door of your room and looked outside. Your mother was nowhere to be seen. Now would be your chance to escape. You were careful not to make a sound and walked to the frontdoor. Suddenly someone knocked on said door. But before you could open it, it was already open and someone walked in. It was professor Kukui. "You must be (name). We already saw us in that call before but I want to properly introduce myself. I'm professor Kukui. But you can call me Kukui. ": He said not knowing in what danger you were in. You tried to get out of the house but it was already to late as you heard the voice of your mother behind you:" Oh hello professor Kukui." "Please just call me Kukui. ":He said. "Ok Kukui. ":she said with a smile. You thought about running out of the house while they were talking. As you began to move to the door Kukui stopped :" You really want to start your adventure, am I right? " Actually to wanted to safe your life. But you just nodded. "Alright then sweety. I don't want you to waste your time at home. Get out and go on an adventure. ":Your Mother said. Well atleast you would get out of here. After both of you said goodbye to your mother you left the house. Kukui led you up a street and you two began to talk. "Why didn't you fear to get eaten by my mother? ":You asked him. "Don't you remember rule nr.3? Girls are only allowed to eat people whitout Pokemon that can fight. So if you ever lose a fight against a girl she can eat you. And if you aren't a trainer. Well.. Let's just say that's game over for you. Some of them break these rules so you should be extra careful. That's why I wanted to meet you as fast as possible. We will get you a Pokemon. And in order to do that we have to go to Iki town" That would certainly help you to survive here in Alola.
123333133311.title: You try to find Professor Kukui

choices: "Maybe I could help you look for him in Icki town "
1233331333111.content: Soon you reached Iki town. A small town build around a wooden podium. "Now we just have to find Hala. He is the Kahuna of this island. A Kahuna is someone who got chosen by our island deity to lead our island trials. You probably want to try these trials when you get a Pokemon but don't think they will be easy. Hala can give you a Pokemon if we find him." You walked a bit and stopped. "He should be here but I think something happened. Let's go find him.": Kukui said and left you alone. Great, now you didn't have someone that could protect you if something happened. However it would be better to find Hala if he really had a Pokemon for you. That's your only chance on survival. You began to search the whole town but you didn't find him. Just as you thought you wouldn't find him someone walked up the path behind the town. If Hala isn't in the town maybe he went up there. You followed the person into the jungle. The path led you to a bridge which was built over a river. As you came closer to that bridge you saw the person again. It was a girl in a white dress. She looked beautiful. But you were soon remebered about the danger girls would cause to you. As you looked closer at her you saw a diaper poking out from under her dress. You should better stay away from her to not get eaten. If she would find out that you have no Pokemon you would be nothing more than a snack to her. Something moved inside her bag. "Please just stay in the bag. ":You heard her say. The bag opened and a Pokemon flew out. "No Nebby stay here.":she shouted as the pokemon flew to the bridge. But the Pokemon didn't get far. Three Spearows attacked it. The girl didn't go to help her Pokemon. You had to do something so you ran up to it and put yourself over it, shielding it with your body. But the pokemon released an explosionwave that destroyed the bridge letting you both fall down to your doom. Just as you thought you would die, something flew to you and within seconds you were back on the ground. Looking at what saved you, you saw a Yellow-blackish colored Pokemon. Something sparkled in it's hands and then it flew away. You looked down to the ground to find a strange stone. You hadn't much time to think about it as the girl walked up to you. "Thank you for saving Nebby. I just had to much fear to help it. " She looked down at Nebby. "And you should probably get in the bag. " The Pokemon flew back in the back. You remebered why you originally followed her and thought about asking her about Hala :"Do you know where Hala is? " She only shook her head. But then she said :
1233331333111.title: You reach Iki town

choices: "You are going to be my meal "
12333313331112.content: "So you don't have a Pokemon?" She came closer. You shouldn't have told her that you were looking for Hala. There is no way she wouldn't take advantage of this situation. She looked at you with a hungry look. You tried to run but she grabbed your arm. With a smile on her face she says :
12333313331112.title: "So you don't have a Pokemon? "

123333133311121.content:
"let's go get you one then!" Said the blonde girl happily. She began​ to drag you back toward you came from. "Wait aren't you rushing this? I don't even know your name!" The girl realized what she did. She blushes "Oh my gosh I'm so sorry! I should have introduced myself." Said the blonde girl. "I'm Lillie. It's nice to meet you." Said Lillie. "I'm (name) you replied. "(Name) that's a nice name!" Said Lillie with a smile. "Now how​ about we get you a Pokemon now."

Are your way back who did you meet?
123333133311121.title: "Let's get you a Pokemon "

1233331333111211.content: As the two of you entered the town you heard someone shouting :" Hey (name) I see that you already met my assistant. I heard Hala is on the way back here. " Professor Kukui stood behind the podium and waved his hand. You walked up to him. Lillie explained what had happened. Kukui whispered in your ear :"I'm surprised she didn't eat you. She usually is pretty quick if she sees a boy without Pokemon. Then again you helped her. " You hadn't much time to speak as you heard some of the villagers shouting :"Hey Hala is back! " You saw an old man walking into the direction of the town. Then he noticed you and Kukui. "Alola Kukui. Is that the boy that wanted a Pokemon. " "Yes that's (name)." "Alright then (name).":He said as he threw three pokeballs on the podium. A cat(Litten), an owl(Rowlet) and a seal(Poplio) appeared. "You can choose only one of them. So choose the one that you like the most ":said Hala.
1233331333111211.title: Professor Kukui

choices: "No I have other plans for you."
12333313331112112.content: You thought Litten was the best of the three because you liked cats. You had a meowth at home so you already had some experience with cats. "I choose Litten. ":you said. The cat pokemon looked happily at you. Hala said :"Seems like Litten also wants to go on a journey with you. Then it's settled. " Litten jumped into your arms. "And you should have this Pokeball if you don't want to hold it in your arms all the time. ":Hala said as he threw a Pokeball to you. You catched it and stored Litten in it. Then you put the ball into your pocket. But something was already in your pocket. It was the stone. You pulled it out of your pocket as Hala began to speak :"Where do you have this stone from? " You held the stone up :" I found it after I got rescued by this Pokemon. " Do you mean Tapu Koko? Could I borrow that stone for a day. I will send it back to you. Don't worry. " You gave him the stone. It's not like you could do anything with it. Kukui :" Now that you have a Pokemon you can partake in the trials if you want. But you should tell your mother first before you go. " Going back to your mother sounded like a dumb idea but it would be better to do so. If you wouldn't tell her then she could call the police to look for you. Who knows what would happen if they get you and bring you back to your mother? So you said goodbye to everyone and left the town only to be stopped by a trainer:" Hi there. I'm Hau and I want to challenge you to a Pokemon battle. " You had to fight him that's a rule but atleast he was a boy so you didn't have to fear to get eaten. He threw a pokeball and a Rowlet appeared. You were lucky. Your Litten was a fire type and therefore effective against grass types like Rowlet. So you threw Litten's pokeball and told the cat to use Ember. The fight didn't last very long as Rowlet fainted. Your Litten reached level 6. "Man you are very strong. But now I should better heal Rowlet before a girl finds out I have no Pokemon to fight with. ":Hau said as he ran away. You walked back to your home. You were lucky again as no one noticed you. As you entered your home. Your mother greeted you :"So what Pokemon did you choose? " You threw Litten's Pokeball and showed her your new Pokemon. "Oh you chose a Litten. That fits you. " :she said with a smile. You had to ask her if you could go on a journey :"Mom can I partake in the trials? " She thought for a bit and then said :
12333313331112112.title: Litten

123333133311121121.content: "Of course you can. ": she said to your surprise. Since you moved here you were scared of your mother because of the rules. But she acted like always. She wouldn't eat you although you couldn't let your guard down. Maybe she will try in the future so you should leave the house as soon as you can. But now it was to late to think about that. You headed to bed. The night was rough. You couldn't sleep because you thought of all the things that had happened. And you had to watch out for your mother if she decides to have a midnight snack. It took you two hours to finally fall asleep. As you woke up you were..
123333133311121121.title: "Of course you can"

1233331333111211211.content: You opened your eyes to see that you were still laying in your bed. Happily you left the bed. You were alive and you had the chance to expand that life by training your Pokemon. You stood up and walked into the living room. Your mother had already made breakfast. You ate a bit and your mother began to talk to you :" This thing was in our mailbox. It's for you. " She handed you some kind of ring and a note. You began to read :" Alola (Name). I used that stone you gave me yesterday to create this Z-ring. This ring can make the attacks of your Pokemon stronger if you have a Z-crystal. You get these crystals by doing the trials. I'm sure you will soon get many of them. Because I know that you are a great trainer. You won against my grandson. " You put the ring around your arm as someone knocked on the door. As you opened the door you saw Lillie standing in front of you :"Alola(Name). Professor Kukui sent me here to bring you to him. He wanted to give you something. " Your mother must've heard Lillie's voice and walked up to you:" Did you already managed to make friends (name). I'm (name's) mother. " Lillie introduced herself :"Alola I'm Lillie the assistant of Professor Kukui. I'm here to escort your son to him. " Your mother laughed :"Well as long as he doesn't end up in your diaper. I'm fine with that. " "Well he looks yummy. ":Lillie got a little red in the face. You couldn't believe it. They were talking about you being eaten as if it were nothing and you stood right beside them. "Could we please go?":You said because the situation was a little bit uncomfortabel. "Sure we can. ":Lillie said as she grabbed your arm and dragged you with her. "I make sure to bring him back to you either complete or as a mess in a diaper. "
1233331333111211211.title: In your bed

She looked at you with a grin :"It's just fun. I am not allowed to eat you if you have a Pokemon that can fight. And I don't fight with Pokemon, you can't even lose to me so that I could eat you. Besides you are really nothing more than food. Every girl or woman talks about boys as if they were food. That's the way it is here in Alola. You better get used to it. You just attack them so that they have low hp and then you throw the Pokeball. " Kukui smiled :" Glad to see that you found that out yourself. It would be a real time waste if everytime I meet a new trainer I would show them how to capture Pokemon. I mean it's really easy. Well if you want to start your journey you should go to the trainer school first. You can train or capture new Pokemon before you do that if you like. "

choices: "sorry sweetie I have plans for you."
12333313331112113.content:
"I choose Popplio!" You happily shouted while looking at the sea lion. "Ah a water type. Very wise choice for a young trainer." Said Hala smiling. "Let's see if Popplio will choose you." Popplio and you were now standing on the stage. Both of you staring off into each other eyes. After a few minutes past. Popplio came at you happily. You raise Popplio up in the air. "It seems Popplio has chosen you." Hala said with his trade mark grin. Suddenly you remembered the stone the girl gave to you.

*Flashback*
"Thank you for saving Nebby!" Said Lillie. "Here I want to give you this as a thank you. Lillie gave you​ a sparkling stone. "I hope it brings you good luck." You smile at Lillie. "Thank you." You said​to Lillie "I hope we can become great friends." Lillie smiled at this. "I would like that." Said Lillie blushing. Lillie turned to Nebby. "Nebby get in the bag!" Nebby slowly got into the bag.

1233332221.content:
You had been chosen to be the guard of princess Zelda, daughter of king Rhoam of Hyrule. It was a hard job. Only the best of the best were chosen to take care of the princess. Which wasn't saying very much, since you were hardly a good fighter. It just so happened that all the good fighters had already met a terrible fate. Responsable for their sudden end was none other than the princess herself. It was no secret that the princess could be very short tempered from time to time. Those who angered her wouldn't see the light of day ever again. Atleast not in their formal form.

It had been six months since the princess had discovered her "special ability". Since then the position of her guard had to be replaced almost daily. It started with her first guard Link. He was perfect in any way. No one ever surpassed him. Something the princess didn't take so lightly. She felt hurt that she herself couldn't master her prophecy. Yet her guard could do almost anything without even having to train for it. The fact that he also never spoke a single word to her also angered her, since she thought that he did it because he thought that she wasn't worthy of acquiring the sealing power. That of course wasn't true. Link would never think bad of Zelda. The princess however, wasn't aware of that.

One day the princess couldn't stop herself anymore. After Link had followed her yet another time because she decided to research an old ruin, the princess grabbed her guard and shoved him down her throat. Why she could do this, was something even she didn't know. She later told her father that it was like an instinct. Attempts to free her guard were futile. And so he slowly died inside of her. The resulting mess was so big that the princess lost control of both her bowels and her bladder. And so she became diaper dependent. Of course she wasn't that fond of that idea to walk around in something like that. But what other way was there? From then on her guard also had to change her diapers. Something like that wasn't the job of a princess after all.

A new guard was assigned and he also vanished quickly. While the incident with Link was only an accident, the ones that followed weren't. The princess took advantage of her new power and everyone that angered her in any way would end up filling her diapers. Sometimes she even ate her guards just because she was hungry. Her behaviour not only resulted in the slow decrease in numbers of the royal militairy, it also decreased the numbers of civilians. The strangest thing about tht was that she only ate males. It was only a matter of time till you would be assigned to take care of her. And you knew it wouldn't end well for you. So when the day came, your friends in the militairy said their goodbyes to you and you knew that you would probably never see them again.

When you stood in front of her room and waited for her to let you in, you could feel your heart beat in an amazing speed. It felt like it would explode any minute now. When the door finally opened, she asked you to come in. You noticed how she was looking at you, like you weren't even human. Once you were fully in her room, she began to ask you questions. From your strenghts and weaknesses to your hobbies. She wrote everything you said down on a piece of paper. Why she did that, was a complete mystery to you, but asking her might result in something you wouldn't like. Other than that, Zelda seemed like a nice girl. Giving you smiles and taking interest in some of your hobbies. This calmed you down a bit.

After she was finished with asking you the questions, she put the paper into a big book. You could've sworn that the title of it was something like "my guards". Was she keeping a register on her guards? While she put the book away, you could see the clear outline of her diaper under her brown pants. Thankfully it wasn't used yet. You immediately looked away however, to not stare at the princess's behind. She would probably not take something like that well. Once she was finished putting her book away, she sat down beside you and looked into your eyes. You weren't quite sure if you should return the gesture. It was then that the royal stomach started to rumble...

In the world of remnant it was compltetly normal that the whole male population was smaller than the female one. Legends said that this wasn't always the case. Someday a girl caused all of this to happen. But nobody knew exactly how. The story was always altered with the time. When exactly she did this and why was a complete mystery.

This brought many problems with it. Since the male population couldn't protect themselves they were easy prey for the grimm. Monsters that wanted to destroy humanity. Humanity had the huntsmen and huntresses to fight the grimm. But since the males were to small to fight anymore the huntsmen vanished. Only the huntresses continued fighting. The girls and women of Remnant always had to watch out to protect the males. Some of them hold the males pretty close to themselves. For example in their bags.

But it was only a matter of time that the girls started to use the males for their own needs. Some of the girls grew tired of always protecting the males. They wanted to have some fun themselves. Cases of rape, kidnapping and even murder started to occur. The males had no power to stop the females from doing what they wanted and had to accept this as a part of their life.

Some groups fought against these females. But nobody could really prevent it from happening. In the end more and more females started to act that way until every male citizen had to fear for his life. It became normal that the females could do what they wanted.

Since the males were so small it didn't take long for a female to accidentally eat one. This woman discovered that the shrunken body she ate provided her with a lot of nutrients aswell as a boost to her aura. She also discovered that the boy she ate was very tasty. In fact so tasty that she took a liking to eating boys and men. From then on it didn't take long before eating males was a completly normal thing to do.

All over remnant boys and men found their ends in the bellies of women. Even the girls started to eat males. Entire families were torn apart. Sisters ate their brothers. Wives ate their husbands. No one was safe from their hunger. Even restaurants or stores sold males they catched to hungry women.

But the females soon noticed that their habit of eating their male counterparts had a downside. They permantly lost the control of their bladders and bowels. As the generations went on, no girl was able control the waste inside of her anymore. So they all walked around in diapers.

Since the females ate the males, the population decreased alot. And because they were so small the reproduction process was alot more difficult. The females had to shove the males up their vaginas to even have a chance to get pregnant. If the males were lucky enough to survive the female orgasm they often got eaten as soon as they left the body of their partner.

And still there was love in this world. The females were still beings with feelings and so they could also form relationships. If one male was lucky enough to form a family he would be safe from most of the dangers in this world. Atleast until their wives or daughters would turn against them. But it also happened alot that the females only tricked them into thinking their love would be returned. By doing that they had an easy meal.

If you were born as a boy you were practically doomed to end as a meal. As soon as you would leave the house you would be in great danger. Of course your family could also eat you but that would only happen if you were extremely unlucky.

As the boys reached a certain age they would be thrown out of their houses. Of course it would be safer to always stay at home but the government put this law into action. The females had to find a male to reproduce and they couldn't just walk into a house that didn't belong to them. So the boys had to be outside for the females to get them. By doing that the government also supported the raping and eating of the males which led to the forming of a resistance of men who wanted to change that.

Someone was standing guard beside it. But before you could run to safety a large shadow formed over you and you felt that you were grabbed. You had no time to look who grabbed you as everything went black.

There was light shining down on you through a small gap. The gap got bigger and a hand reached in. You tried to avoid the hand but in the end it still got you.

info.brief_description: A Story about a world in which females wear diapers and eat men.
info.description:
For an unkown reason Women and girls wear diapers and eat men. You can choose the world in which the protagonist lives in. The reader can also be the protagonist. The Protagonist can however try to get the girls/women to like him. But that doesn't mean he is safe

rules:
No regression
No inflation
No weight gain or loss
keep the story as long as possible
The protagonist has to be male
The girls are the ones wearing the diapers
